GSP28durdhpru:285: tad uktaṃ kāvyālaṅkāre “śabdārthau sahitau kāvyaṃ“[15][kā 1,16] iti |
GSP28durdhpru:293_0: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- śabdārthayor avacchedyāvacchedakatvena sthitayoḥ prakaraṇatvaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:294: yady evaṃ śarīratvāviśeṣāt abhidheyasyevābhidhānātmano 'pi tat kiṃ nocyate?
GSP28durdhpru:296: na niṣkṛṣṭarūpe 'bhidheye puruṣaḥ pravarttate kiṃ tu grantha eva śravaṇalakṣanāṃ pravṛttim ācarati abhidheyajñānāya |
GSP28durdhpru:297: tad asyaiva prayojanaṃ vācyam iti pūrvapakṣadvitayaṃ paśyann āha -- tatreti nirdhā[4b]raṇe caitat |
GSP28durdhpru:298: nānyad iti puruṣapravṛtty upayogi ayam asyāśayaḥ -- na hi śabdasya svārthapratyāyanalakṣaṇaṃ phalam astīti śabdasandarbha ārabhyate śrūyate vā,
GSP28durdhpru:301: ataḥ kim anenoktenāpīti? tarhi abhidheyasyāpi tat kim ucyata ity āha -- abhidheyaṃ tu ityādi |
GSP28durdhpru:303: apiśabdo nārambhaṇīya ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:304: tad ayam arthaḥ -- tatpratipattaye śabdānāṃ sandarbho nārambhaṇīyo 'pi syāt,
GSP28durdhpru:307: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā |
GSP28durdhpru:308: tasmād asya prakaraṇasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā abhidheyaprayojanam anenocyate |
GSP28durdhpru:310: tasmāt tatpratipattaye idam ārabhyata ity ayam atra vākyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:311: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvam prayojanam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:313: yathaitad darśitaṃ tadvat sarvaṃ draṣṭvyam iti yathāśabdārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:316: parīkṣaṇaṃ vā parīkṣā vimṛṣyāvadhāraṇaṃ tādarthyāt śāstram api tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:317: nanu niṣprayojanābhidheyaṃ mārambhi, vacanena tv anena kiṃ kriyata ity āha -- tasmād ityādi |
GSP28durdhpru:318: yasmān niṣprayonanābhidheyaṃ nārabhyate tasmād ārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā ārambhayogyam evedaṃ mayārabhyata iti prakāśayatā,
GSP28durdhpru:319: ārambhaṇīyate ca darśite śravaṇīyatvam api nimittasāmyād darśitaṃ bhavatīti te pravarttitā bhavanti |
GSP28durdhpru:320: nanu ca samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir ity anenaikadeśenābhidheyaprayojanam uktam, na samuditena |
GSP28durdhpru:321: tat katham anena “vākyenocyate” ity ucyate? ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:322: vākyaṃ hi nāmaikasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye guṇaguṇibhāvam anubhavatām arthadvāreṇānyonyāpekṣiṇāṃ sambaddhānāṃ padānāṃ samūha ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:323: tatra yadi sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ syāt tadā parasparānupakārāt sambandha eva padānāṃ na syād iti vākyarūpataiva hīyeteti sūktam aneneti |
GSP28durdhpru:324: abhidheyaprayojanābhidhānam evāsya samyagjñānetyādipadasamūhātmakasya yathā tathā yasmād ityādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti |
GSP28durdhpru:326: etac ca tad vyutpādyata ity asya sāmarthyāvasthitārthakathanaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:327: itinā vākyārthasya svarūpam, idamā ca buddhisiddhatvena tad evāṅgulīvyapadeśayogyam iva darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:330: ata eva cārthena nyāyena puruṣārthasidder vākyārthatvam |
GSP28durdhpru:331: śābdyā tu vṛttyā śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyuptattikriyā vākyārtha iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:332: nanu samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena samyagjñānasya purṣārthasiddhau hetubhāvaḥ paraṃ pradarśito na punar idaṃ tasya prayojanam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:335: tāvatāpi na jñāyate kasya kiṃ tad abhidheyaṃ kiṃ ca tasya prayojanam ity āśaṅkyāha -- atra cetyādi |
GSP28durdhpru:336: atha samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanam ity avadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:338: tathā hi puruṣārthasiddhim evācāryīyaṃ samyagjñānetyādivacanaṃ prayojanam anujānāti na tu puruṣārthasi[5a]ddhihetutvam |
GSP28durdhpru:339: avayavārthavyākhyāne tasya tām eva prayojanatayā vyaktīkaraṣyati |
GSP28durdhpru:340: na ca hetutvaṃ hator bhinnam iṣyate yujyate vā |
GSP28durdhpru:343: asmiṃś cārtha ucyamāne sambandhaprayojanābhidheyāni uktāni bhavanti |
GSP28durdhpru:345: na cātra prayojanaṃ prayojakaṃ vācyam, uktanyāyāt |
GSP28durdhpru:347: na ca rājaśāsanaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti yena bhāvapradhānaḥ prayojanaśabdaḥ kalpyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:354: tato yasmāt prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:355: tasymāt prayojanam uktam iti dvir āvartanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:357: samyagjñānasya tāṃ prati hetutvoktau ca sā prayojanam ukteti kiṃ sākṣād vācakena padena kriyata iti bhāvaḥ etāvataiva tāvad idaṃ sādhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:359: sarvā puruṣārthasiddhir yato hetutvāt tat sarvapuruṣārthasiddhi,
GSP28durdhpru:360: tathāvidhaṃ hetutvaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ tat tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:363: kasya tādṛśam ity apekṣāyām idam uktam -- prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasyeti kecit pratipadyante |
GSP28durdhpru:365: [16]āditve prayojanam asyāstīti matvarthīyamataṃ vidhāya pradhānavan nirdeśaṃ vivakṣitvā prayojanavattvam iti pratijānate |
GSP28durdhpru:366: evaṃ cārtahṃ samarthayanti -- yata eva puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānasādhyā tata eva sā prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:367: tasyāpi yad eva tām prati hetutvaṃ tad eva prayojanavattvam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:371: eka tu yataḥ samyagjñāne sati puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:372: tataḥ pramāṇaphalavad vyavasthāpy avyavasthāpanabhāvam āśriyedam uktaṃ tato na kiñcid avadyam iti mayante |
GSP28durdhpru:373: apare tu caśabdaṃ bhinnakramaṃ kṛtvā puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:375: itare tu puruṣārthasiddhihetuśabdena kāraṇe kāryam upacarya puruṣārthasiddhim evābhidadhati |
GSP28durdhpru:377: kecit tu nibandhakṛtaḥ kathañcid apīdaṃ samarthayitum anīśānāḥ sahitaśabdapātāt pramādapāṭhā eveti varṇayanti |
GSP28durdhpru:381: tadvat sambadhādikam api kiṃ nocyata ity āha -- asmiṃś ceti | co yasmādarthe |
GSP28durdhpru:383: tathā hi prurṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam anena prakareṇeti bruvatā samyagjñānam asya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam,
GSP28durdhpru:385: prakaraṇam ca idam apāyo vyutpādanasya ity uktam bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:387: na tv idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ sambandham, abhidheyam, prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham |
GSP28durdhpru:388: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sāmarthyāt darśayati | tatra
GSP28durdhpru:389: kathaṃ punar anyasyoktānyad uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tathā hi iti |
GSP28durdhpru:390: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yasmād ity asyārthe sarvatra varttate |
GSP28durdhpru:391: puruṣārtho heyopādeyahānopādānalakṣaṇa upayogo vyāpāraḥ | so 'syāstīti tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:392: evaṃ sati kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:399: tathā sambandhādīny api kiṃ nocyanta ity āha -- na tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:401: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi sarve padārthāḥ prādhānyam aśnuvīran,
GSP28durdhpru:403: tato vākyam ekārtham abhidheyatayā upādātuṃ kalpyate nānekam |
GSP28durdhpru:404: yadi sākṣān na samartham, kathaṃ nāsamartham? athāsamartham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:405: na sākṣāt samartham iti tarhi na vācyam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:410: ata evoktānī viktānīti tathā 'samābhir vyākhyātam, nayathā tad anena virudhyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:411: nanu yadi nāmābhidheyādikaṃ vākyasya prakāśyam, nābhidheyam, tahāpi padārthena tenāvaśyaṃ bhāvyam |
GSP28durdhpru:412: tathā ca kasya kiṃ vādakaṃ padam ity āśaṅky āha -- tatra ityādi -- teśu abhidheyādiṣū |
GSP28durdhpru:416: prayojanaṃ ca atra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate, śrotuś ca śravaṇavyāpārasya |
GSP28durdhpru:417: tathā hi -- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanam anviṣya pravartante |
GSP28durdhpru:418: tataśa ca ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kim arthaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28durdhpru:419: śrotṛbhiś ca kim artham śruyata iti saṃśaye vyutpādanaṃ prayojanābhidhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:420: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇam idam kṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:421: śiṣyaiś ca ācāryaprayuktām ātmano vyutpattim icchadbhiḥ prakaraṇam idaṃ śruyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
GSP28durdhpru:423: yato vyutpādyata ity atra lakāraḥ prayojyakarmaṇi vihito na prayojyakriyākarmaṇīti |
GSP28durdhpru:424: vākye 'pi loke padyate gamyate 'nenārtha iti vyutpattyā padaprayogo dṛśyate |
GSP28durdhpru:425: tato vyutpādyata iti prayojanapadam ity āha |
GSP28durdhpru:427: yad vā vyutpādyata ity atreti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:430: kathaṃ ca tad anyatocyata ity āha -- prayojanaṃ cātra iti |
GSP28durdhpru:432: tad ayam arthaḥ -- noktaṃ prayojanam iti cintyate kiṃ tu guṇabhūtārthaprayojakapadasya vyutpādyata ity asya prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:433: tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata iti ṇicaḥ kiṃ prayojanam iti praśne tasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:435: nanu kasmād iyam āśaṅkā -- `vaktrā kimarthaṃ krityate, śrotṛbhiś ca kimarthaṃ śrūyata' iti |
GSP28durdhpru:436: tau khalv evam eva pravartteyātām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tathā hīti yasmāt |
GSP28durdhpru:437: atha katham ubhayor vyutpādanaṃ prayojanam ucyatge?
GSP28durdhpru:438: yady ato vyutpadyate tasya vyutpattiḥ prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:439: yas tu vyutpādayati tasya vyutpādanam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:441: prayojakavyāpāravatī hi vyutpattiḥ prayojanam iṣṭety ubhayor vyutpādanam eva prajyojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:443: kathaṃ nāma madvyāpāravaśena śrotṛsantānavarttinī vyutpattir bhūyād iti ācāryaḥ pravarttate |
GSP28durdhpru:444: ata eva svaprayojakavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā śrotṛsantānavārttinī vyutpattḥ karttuḥ prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:448: ata evācāryavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā vyatpattiḥ śrotur api prayojanam | evam evāsau tadvyutpādyo
GSP28durdhpru:450: sambandhapradarśanapadam tu na vidyate | sāmarthyād eva tu sa pratipattavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:451: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānāv avyutpādanāya prakaraṇam idam ārabdhavatā ayam eva upāyo na anyaḥ iti darśita eva upāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:453: tato vyutpādanaṃ prayojakavyāpāravaśavarttinī vyuptattir dvoyor api prayojanam iti itiśabdaṃ hetupadaṃ kṛtopasaṃharann āha -- prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:454: nanu ca ṇici kṛte vyutpādanaṃ katham ubhayoḥ prayojanam, ittham iti [6a] praśnavisarjane syātām |
GSP28durdhpru:456: samyagjñānavyutpattau kathañcin nimittamātrāt dadhibhojanāder ācāryasyāsādhāraṇakāraṇatāpratipattiḥ prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:457: ayam arthaḥ -- asti paryojakavyāpārapradarśane samyagjñānavyutpattāv upayogitvamātreṇa svāsthyādinā sāmyam ācāryasya darśitaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:459: sa kathāṃ nāma pratīyeteti ṇicā nirdeśaḥ kṛta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:460: atha bhojanādes tadvyutpattau sākṣād vyāpārā 'sambhavād ācāryavyāpāraḥ pratipatsyata iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:462: evaṃ hi vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ pratipādanakauśalaṃ syān na karttur iti nyāyyo ṇicā nirdeśaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:463: nanūktam -- abhidhānasya prayojanaṃ na nirūpyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:464: tat kim idānīṃ tad eva vyājāntareṇa nirūpyate? satyam |
GSP28durdhpru:465: kevalaṃ vākyārthatvena na nirūpyata ity abhisandhinā` `tan na nirūpyate' ity uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:467: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānām ity asādhur ayaṃ śabdaḥ -- `vyutpattyarthasya pader akarmatvād' iti bhāgavṛttikāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:469: jñānārthasya padeḥ sakarmakasya `vyutpannaḥ saṅketaḥ' ityādau bahuśaḥ prayogadarśanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:471: mano 'vyu(-mano vyu)tpannasaṃkentam asti tena sa cen mata[PV II 143]iti |
GSP28durdhpru:472: yady abhidheyādyaḥ padārthāḥ, sambandhas tarhi kasya padasyārtha ity āha -- sambandheityādi |
GSP28durdhpru:476: kathaṃ sāmarthyād ity āha -- prekṣāvatā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:484: anarthāśaṅkopasthāpitānyayoganirāse tu karttavye sāmarthyagamyam avadhāraṇāntaraṃ kāryam |
GSP28durdhpru:486: nānya iti ca nānya evety avaseyam |
GSP28durdhpru:488: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāg uktāny api abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhir na grahyante |
GSP28durdhpru:491: aśruyate prakaraṇe kathitāny api na niścīyante |
GSP28durdhpru:492: ukteṣu tv apramānakeśv apy abhidheyādiśu saṃśaya utpadyate |
GSP28durdhpru:495: evaṃrūpasya sambandho vyutpādyata iti prayojanābhidhānād eva darśatam | tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:500: taduktyantargatas tasmād bhinno noktaḥ prayojanād ||” [ślokavā- 1,18] iti
GSP28durdhpru:501: abhidheyādiprakāśanadvāreṇādivākyaṃ pravarttakam iti asahamāna āha -- nanu ca iti |
GSP28durdhpru:502: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ `codayāmi', `abhimukho bhava' ity asyārthasya dyotakaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:503: śravaṇānantaraṃ teṣāṃ prākśabdāśrayeṇa pravarttamānam anumānam anyad vā śabdasyārthanāntarīyatāyāṃ pravarttayitum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:506: ācāryasya cāptabhāvo durbodho yenāptopadeśatayā śabdo 'rthatathātvaṃ pratyāyayed iti |
GSP28durdhpru:511: yadi satyam idaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhi [6b] te kathyanta iti? ukteṣu iti |
GSP28durdhpru:513: anenaitad āha -- sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve yena rte vyāhārāt pratiniyatādhikaraṇo yauktaḥ saṃayo bhavitum arhatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:514: api nyāyataḥ sambhāvanāṃ darśayati, atiśayaṃ vā |
GSP28durdhpru:515: anyathā kiṃ sapramāṇakeṣv api saṃśayo jāyate yenāpiśrutiḥ samgacchet |
GSP28durdhpru:517: pravṛttiś cen nāsti kiṃ saṃśayenotpāditenāpīty āha -- śaṃśayāc ca iti | co yamādarthe |
GSP28durdhpru:518: atha ye tāvan madāḥ śraddhayā vā ''cāryam upasannās te tadvacanād arthaṃ niścityaiva pravarttamānā na saṃśayāt pravarttante |
GSP28durdhpru:519: ye 'pi tadviparītāḥ saṃśerate teṣām api na śaṃśayāt pravṛttiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:520: pravṛttau vā prekṣāvattvahānir ity āśaṅkyāha -- arthasaṃśayo 'pīti |
GSP28durdhpru:522: śakyaniścaye hi niścayam antareṇa pravarttamānāḥ prekṣāvattāyā hīyeran |
GSP28durdhpru:523: yatra tv arthasaṃśayenārthitayā pravarttamānāḥ, nopālambham arhantīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:524: yadi ca yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśena saṃśayānasya na kvacit pravṛttiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:525: tarhi na kasyacid vacanāt kvacit pravarttitavyam iti bhūyān vyavahāro vilupyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:533: anarthasaṃśayo 'pi nivṛttyaṅgam ata eva śāstrakāreṇa eva pūrvam sambandhādīni yujyante vaktum |
GSP28durdhpru:534: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi vacanaṃ krīḍādyartham anyathā api sambhāvyate |
GSP28durdhpru:535: śāstrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītābhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmo na api pravṛttim |
GSP28durdhpru:537: anukteṣu tu pratipatṛbhir niṣprayojanam abhidheyaṃ sambhāvyeta asya prakaraṇasya kākadantaparīkṣāyā iva,
GSP28durdhpru:540: ato vā prakaraṇāt laghutara upāyaḥ prayojanasya,
GSP28durdhpru:542: vākyenetiy āha -- anarthety ādi | na kevalam anarthaniścayo 'pīty api śabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:543: yady avaśyaṃ vaktavyānyabhidheyādīni tarhi vyākhyātāra eva tāni vakṣyanti |
GSP28durdhpru:544: tat kiṃ śāstrakṛto vyāhāreṇetiy āha -- śāstrakāreṇaiva na vyākhyātṛbhiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:546: abhidheyādyanabhidhāne tu pravṛtter evāsambhavāt kathaṃ sambhavino vyākhyātāro yenāśaṅkya teṣāṃ vyāhāram ayaṃ nirasyatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:548: na sarvathā 'bhidheyādiprakāśanaṃ kenacin na karttavyam eveti codyaṃ pravṛttam,
GSP28durdhpru:549: kin tv ādivākyaṃ tadarthaṃ na karttavyam ity abhisandhinā |
GSP28durdhpru:550: tatra ye tāvat sākṣād ācāryopasannās teṣāṃ tadvacanād eva tatpratītau pravṛttijñānayoḥ sambhavāt sambhavi vyākhyātṛtvam |
GSP28durdhpru:551: tebhyo 'pi tad upasannānām iti kim avadyam?

GSP28durdhpru:1012: nanu ca deśaniyatam ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:1014: tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum. na ucyate -- yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1015: tasminn eva kāle prāpayitavyam iti. anyo hi darśanakālaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1016: anyaś ca prāptikālaḥ. kiṃ tu -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnam,
GSP28durdhpru:1017: tad eva tena prāpaṇīyam. abhedādhyavasāyāc ca santānagatam ekatvaṃ draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28durdhpru:1019: ardharātraḥ kāla āgamanakālo yasya tasmin na pramāṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:1020: atha vā yo 'rdharātre supto 'hno madhyam udgate savitari putram āgataṃ dṛṣṭavā prabhātāyāṃ rātrau sampanne madhyandine tasminn eva ca deśe tam eva suta(-taṃ)
GSP28durdhpru:1022: tasya taj jñānaṃ saṃvādamātrabhāg api na pramāṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1024: tadānīm anāgatam api putram āgataṃ, tenāvagatam |
GSP28durdhpru:1025: na cārdharātre deśakālaniyatasya putrasya, tasya ca kālasyāsti sadbhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1026: tadā tv ardharātraḥ paramārthataḥ pratibhāsakālo yasya madhyāhnakālayuktavastuna iti yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1027: etena suptasya kenacit paṭhyamānaṃ granthaṃ śṛṇvato jñānam asatyārthaṃ vyākhyātam avaseyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1028: yasmād deśakālabhinnātmānaṃ śrotāraṃ granthaṃ ca śrotavyaṃ paśyati nidropahataḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1030: yaddeśakālau ca stas tathā na gṛhṇātīti |
GSP28durdhpru:1031: anayaiva ca diśā vājisvapno 'pi vyākhyāto draṣtavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1032: yatas tatrāpi ghoṭakasvapne yatkāladarśanavi[12a]ṣayā bhāvā dṛśyante na tathā santi,
GSP28durdhpru:1033: yatkālāś ca santi tatkālā na dṛśyante |
GSP28durdhpru:1034: ardharātrādiṣu hi svapnadarśanam, sūryodayādisambaddhāś ca te bhāvā dṛśyante |
GSP28durdhpru:1035: tasmāt svapne keṣāñcid anubhūtānāṃ atyantam abhāvād arthakriyāyā nāsti sattvam |
GSP28durdhpru:1036: kecit tu arthakriyākāritayā abhimatāh saty asvapne viṣayā dṛṣṭakālabhedavyabhicāriṇo na santy eveti prakaraṇārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1037_0: idam īdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ svapnajñānam udāharato dharmottarasyāyam āśayaḥ -- evaṃvidhasya
GSP28durdhpru:1037_1: svapnajñāṇasya sadarthatvābhimānaḥ keṣāñcit satyasvapnavādinām astīti tad abhimānaśamanāyedaṃ mayodāharaṇīkṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:1038: na tv asmād anyasya svapnajñānasya kaśicd viśeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1040: idānīṃ `paricchidyamānasya yatkālaṃ paricchedanaṃ tatkālam eva prāpyamāṇasya prāpaṇaṃ abhimatam' -- evaṃ bruvata iti matvā 'syārthasyānupapattiṃ codyati -- nanu ca -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1041: deśe niyatam ākāre niyataṃ ca śakyaṃ prāpayitum ity abhidadhāno 'nayor avipratipattim āha |
GSP28durdhpru:1042: idaṃ tu na sambhāvyata ity āha -- yatkālaṃ tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1044: yaḥ kālo sya paricchedanasya tad yathā bhavati tathā paricchinnam |
GSP28durdhpru:1045: sa kālo yasya prāpaṇasya tad yathā bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:1047: yasmin kāle paricchinnam tasmin kāle na śakyate prāpayitum ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1048: evaṃ ca bruvatā 'nena kālāntaragrāhīti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:1050: nocyata ityādinā siddhāntavādī codakasyānuktopālambham āha | anenāpi na kiñcit
GSP28durdhpru:1052: samyagjñānam pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā |
GSP28durdhpru:1053: kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:1057: tat kiṃ tvayaivaṃ nocyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praty asyaivābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati -- anyo hi -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1059: yady evaṃ nocyate tarhi kiṃ nāmocyata ity āha -- kin tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1062: na hi yad eva paricchinnam ity asti yenaivam ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1063: yatkālaṃ tu prariccchinnaṃ tatkālam iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum, na tad eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:1066: yatkālam ity anena hi takālam iti prāptam, tad eveti tacchabdena vastuviṣayo yacchabda ākṛṣyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1067: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnaṃ yad vastu takālaṃ tad eva vastu prāpanīyam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1069: evaṃ khalu vākyaṃ syāt samarthitam, pūrvapakṣāt punar asyāviśeṣaḥ prāptaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1070: asti viśeṣo mahān, kevalaṃ bhavatā na samīcīnaṃ nirūpitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1071: tathā hi pūrvapakṣāvasthāyāṃ yatkālaṃ tatkālaṃ iti cātra bahuvrīhiṇā paricchedanalakṣaṇā prāpaṇalakṣaṇā ca kriyā 'bhidhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1073: yad vastu yena kālena sambaddhaṃ paricchinnaṃ tad eva tena kālena sambaddhaṃ svarūpeṇa prāpaṇīyaṃ tadā 'nyadā vā |
GSP28durdhpru:1074: paricchedasya yādṛśaḥ kālas tasmin kāle yad vidyamānaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:1075: tataś ca paricchedakā[12b]lā 'sato yad grāhakaṃ tan na pramāṇam ity avatiṣṭhate |
GSP28durdhpru:1076: nocyate yasmin kāla ityādinā ca yad etad uktaṃ tad bāhyaprāpaṇābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1077: paramārthatas tu jñānasya pradarśanād anyaḥ prānapaṇāvyāpāro nāstīti yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate 'rthas tasminn eva kāle prāpyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1078: etac cānantaram evānenaiva vistareṇa pratipāditam iti svavacanavyāghāto 'nyathā 'sya syād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1079: nanv evam api paricchedakālavarttinaḥ prāpaṇaṃ na sambhavaty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:1081: tathā copadarśitārthaprāpakatvaṃ nāma kasyacid api jñānasya nāstīty asambhavitaiva samyagjñānatvalakṣanasya syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- abhedeti |
GSP28durdhpru:1084: ayam asya bhāvaḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasyeha pramāṇasya lakṣaṇām ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1086_0: tatra yady api vastusthityā paricchinnaprāpyayor nānātvaṃ tathāpi vyavaharttāro nirantarāparāparotpatter
GSP28durdhpru:1086_1: avidyāvaśāc ca hetuphalarūpaṃ kṣaṇapracayaṃ tad evedam ity ekatvenādhimuñcanti tataḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1088: tad anena prabandhena samayagjñanapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā pūrvaśabdaṃ vyācikhyāsus tena sādharmasya vigraham āha -- samyagjñānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1090: dvividhaṃ ca samyagjñānam arthakriyānirbhāsam, arthakriyāsamarthe ca pravartakam |
GSP28durdhpru:1092: tad iha parīkṣyate. tac ca pūrvamātram. na tu sākṣātkāraṇam. samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1095: pravṛtteś ca prāptiḥ. tato na sākṣāthetuḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1098: tathā ca samyagjñānakāraṇiketi vaktum ucitaṃ tatkim evam uktam ity āha -- kāryād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1099: anena vyavasthāvācī sann eva pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe varttata iti darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:1100: bhavad iti `lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ' [pāṇini 3.2.126] iti hetau śatur vidhānāt hetupadam etat |
GSP28durdhpru:1101: yady evaṃ kāraṇaśabda eva kriyatām ity āha -- kāraṇeti |
GSP28durdhpru:1102: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ -- karotīti kāraṇam ucyate, na tv akurvad rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:1104: na ca mukhye sambhavati amukhye pratyayo yujyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1105: tato yad eva jñānam avyavadhānena puruṣārthasiddher nibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1106: tad eva kāraṇaśabdena pratīyeteti. yadi pūrvagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ pratyayas tadā ko viśeṣa ity āha -- pūrvaśabda iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1107: tuḥ kāraṇaśabdād viśeṣam asyāha -- pūrvamātram iti sākṣātkāraṇam itaraś ca |
GSP28durdhpru:1110: sarvasyaiva puruṣārthasiddhiṃ prati sākṣātkāraṇatvād ity āha -- dvividhaṃ ca -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1112_0: kathaṃ dvaividhyam ity āha -- arthakriyeti. nirbhāsate 'sminn iti nirbhāsaḥ. arthakriyāyā
GSP28durdhpru:1112_1: nirbhāso yasmāt tat tathā. yataḥ sādhanajñānād anantaraṃ dāhādipratibhāsajñāṇam utpadyate, tad evam ucyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1113: kecit tu kṣaṇena kāryakāraṇāvyavahārasyārvāgdarśanena karttum aśakyatvād dāhādipratibhāsam eva jñānam evaṃ bruvate |
GSP28durdhpru:1118: anyoḥ kiṃ parīkṣyata ity āha tayoḥ -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1119: pravarttakam api sākṣātkāraṇaṃ tat ko 'nyatra vidveṣo yenedam eva vicāryate?
GSP28durdhpru:1120: kiṃ vā pūrvaśabdenety āha -- tac ca iti. co yasmāt.
GSP28durdhpru:1121: ayam āśayaḥ -- yataḥ pravarttante tat sarvam arthaprāpter vyavahitaṃ kāraṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:1122: ataś ca sambhavat pratibandhaṃ tat pravṛttyaṅgatvāt pūrvamātram, na tv anantaraṃ kāraṇam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1124: amum eva draḍhyann āha -- na tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1126: kuta etad ity āha -- samyagjñāna iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1131: tataḥ pravṛttiḥ pravarttakajñānopadarśitam arthaṃ prāptukāmā vyāpārasahāyā buddhiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1133: yasmāt smaraṇādinā vyavadhānaṃ tataḥ tasmāt na sākṣāṭ hetuḥ prāpter upāyaḥ puruṣārthasidder iti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1136: tathā api tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. yatra eva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1137_0: tat parīkṣyate. arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāne sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. tena tatra
GSP28durdhpru:1137_1: na sāśaṅkā arthinaḥ. atas tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. tasmāt parīkṣārham asākṣātkāraṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1137_2: samyagjñānam ādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam.
GSP28durdhpru:1142: yadi paramparayā 'pi prāptihetuḥ parīkṣyate tarhi sākṣāt hetur atitarāṃ parīkṣaṇīya ity āha -- arthakriyānirbhāsam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1144: yada prāptihetur iti pāṭhas tadā arthakriyānirbhāsam ity asyāntyavyākhyānapakṣe bhinnā santoṣādiprāptir lokādhyavasāyasiddhā yā tasyā hetuḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1148: kasmāt tat na parīkṣyata ity āha -- yatraiva hi -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1152: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- na vyasanam etac chāstrakṛto yena jñānam aprīkṣamāṇaḥ svāsthyam alabhamānaḥ parīkṣate |
GSP28durdhpru:1155: tato yatraiva te tathāpravṛttayas tad eva parīkṣyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1156: arthakriyānirbhāse 'pi te tathāvṛttaya ity āha -- arthakriyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:1162: vyākhyānadvaye 'pi arthakriyānirbhāsaśabdavācyadvaye sthite dvayam etat śaṅkāyāḥ kāraṇam -- anantaraphalādarśanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1164: tadabhābe tu kathaṃ śaṅkerann iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1165: mā bhūvaṃs tatra sāśaṅkās tat kiṃ siddham ity āha-- ata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1166: yadi vyavahitaṃ pravarttakaṃ puruṣārthasiddher na kāraṇaṃ tarhi katham uktam -- `kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam' iti?
GSP28durdhpru:1167: asākṣātkāraṇe cākāraṇe kāraṇa[13b]viśeṣaṇaṃ sākṣād iti nirarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha -- tasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1168_0: yasmāt sākṣātkāraṇam āśaṅkānāspadaṃ sad aparīkṣaṇīyaṃ tasmād yad asākṣātkāraṇam ata
GSP28durdhpru:1168_1: eva ca parīkṣārhaṃ parīkṣkṣāyogyaṃ pravarttakaṃ samyagjñānam ādarśayitum ādarśayiṣyāmi
GSP28durdhpru:1168_2: -- iti kāraṇaśabdaṃ vihāya pūrvagahaṇaṃ kṛtam ācāryeṇety arthāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1169: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yo 'yaṃ kāraṇaśabdo vyavahite kāraṇakāraṇe varttate nāyaṃ tatrābhidhāyakatvena varttate karotīti kāraṇam iti vyutpatteḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1172: puruṣasya arthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. arthyata ity arthaḥ kāmyata iti yāvat. heyo 'rtha upādeyo vā. heyo hy artho hāntum iṣyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1173: upādeyo 'pi upādātum. na ca heyopādeyābhyām anyo rāśir asti. upekṣaṇīyo hy anupādeyatvāt heya eva. tasya siddhiḥ hānam upādānaṃ ca. hetunibandhanā hi siddhir utpattir ucyate,
GSP28durdhpru:1174: jñānanibandhanā tu siddhir anuṣṭhānam. heyasya ca hānam anuṣṭhānam,
GSP28durdhpru:1175: upādeyasya ca upādānam. tato heyopadeyayor hānopādānalakṣaṇānuṣṭhitiḥ siddhir ity ucyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1177: syād etat -- saty api kāraṇagrahaṇe vicārārham eva samyagjñāṇaṃ pratipatsyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1178: yatas tad vyutpādyata ity arthaḥ, sādhyatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1180_0: tena pradhānānurodhāt tacchabdo varṇitayā nītyā mukhyasya kāraṇasya samyagjñānasya
GSP28durdhpru:1181: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīty atra pradhānānurodhāt mañcaśabdaḥ krośanakriyākarttṛtvānupapatteṛ mukhyam arthaṃ tyaktvā lakṣaṇayā tātsthyabhūtayā pratyāsattyā puruṣeṣu varttata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1183: kevalam evaṃ sati vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ kauśalaṃ syān na śāstrakṛta iti sarvam anavadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1184: idānīṃ puruṣārthasiddipadaṃ vivariṣuḥ puruṣaśabdena sārdham arthaśabdasya vigraham,
GSP28durdhpru:1186: arthyata ity ācakṣāṇo[25]`artha yācñāyām' ity ato ṇijantāt karmaṇyacaṃ darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:1187: arthyata ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati -- kāmyata iṣyata ity anena yāvān evārthaṃ uktas tāvān evārthyata ity anenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1189: [25] artha upayācñāyām -- dhātupāṭha 10,373 | {Nach Ausgabe in Böthlingk ist es in 10,357}
GSP28durdhpru:1191: ko 'sāv arthaṃ ity āha -- heya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1194: na tarhi heyo 'rtha ity āha -- heya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1196: heyo hātuṃ tyaktum iṣyate tasmād arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1198: atra yady api svīkaraṇecchā nāsti tathāpi parihārecchā tāvad astīti |
GSP28durdhpru:1199: yadi hātum iṣyamāṇo 'rthaḥ katham upādeyo 'rtha ity āha -- upādeyo 'pīṣyate kevalam upādātum |
GSP28durdhpru:1200: na kevalaṃ heya iṣyate ity apiśabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1201: nanu ca na heyopādeyāv artho 'pi tv anyo 'pi |
GSP28durdhpru:1202: tataḥ so 'pi kasmān na pradarśyata ity āha -- na ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:1205: yatra na pravṛttir yataś ca na nirvṛttiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1206: tat katham anubhavasiddhasyāpahnva ity āha -- upekṣaṇīya iti | hir yasmāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1208: tattra yady anupādeyatvād dheyas tadā 'heyatvād upādeyaḥ kiṃ na bhavati” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1209: sādhūktaṃ tena bhadantena kevalaṃ heyaśabdārthavicāre mano na
GSP28durdhpru:1211: sarvā cāsau puruṣārthasiddhiś ceti. sarvaśabda iha dravyakārtsnye vṛttaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1212: na tu prakārakārtsnye. tato na ayam arthaḥ -- dviprakārā api siddhiḥ samyagjñānanibandhanā eva iti. api tv ayam arthaḥ -- yā kācit siddhiḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1213: sā sarvā kṛtsnā eva asau samyagjñānanibandhanā iti. mithyājñānād dhi kākatālīyāpi nāsty arthasiddhiḥ. tathā hi -- yadi pradarśitam artham prāpayaty evam tato bhavaty arthasiddhiḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1217: hīyate, tyajyate, na svīkriyate iti heyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1220: tena ahiviṣakaṇṭakādīnām api hānaṃ tatrā [14a] 'pravṛttir eva |
GSP28durdhpru:1222: tathā ca yadi tasya svīkāro bhavet, tadā 'heyatvaṃ siddhim adhyāsīta |
GSP28durdhpru:1223: na ca tat svīkriyata iti vyaktam ayaṃ hetur asiddhas tasya |
GSP28durdhpru:1226: athānubhavasiddhasya tṛtīyarāśer upekṣaṇiyasyāsvīkaraṇamātrād dheyena sārdham aikyapratipādanam ayuktam iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:1228: na hi vayam api prasiddhyor heyopekṣaṇiyayor arthayor ekasvabhāvatām ātiṣṭhāmahe |
GSP28durdhpru:1229: kin tu kriyānimittena heyaśabdenaikābhidhānam tathā 'svīkaraṇārthena hānaśabdenopekṣāyā abhidhānam iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:1231: adhunā siddhiśabdasyārthapadena vigrahaṃ bruvann artham āha -- tasya -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1233: yathaudanasya siddhir iti. tat katham evaṃ varṇyata ity āha -- hetunibadhaneti. hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ nibaddhyate 'sminn iti nibandhanaṃ pratibandhaviṣayaḥ |

GSP28durdhpru:2687: bhūtaḥ sadbhūto 'rthaḥ | pramāṇena dṛṣṭaś ca sadbhūtaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2689: bhūtasya bhāvanā punaḥ punaś cetasi viniveśanam |
GSP28durdhpru:2691: prakarṣasya paryanto yadā sphuṭābhatvam īṣadasampūrṇaṃ bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:2692: yāvad dhi sphuṭābhatvam aparipūrṇaṃ tāvat tasya prakarṣagamanam |
GSP28durdhpru:2693: bhūtaśabdasya vivakṣitam artham āha -- sadbhūta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2694: artha iti bruvāṇo bhūtaś cāsāv arthaś ceti karmadhārayaṃ darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:2695: nanu sukhādimayatvam apy arthasya sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ sadbhūtam ity āha -- pramāṇeneti |
GSP28durdhpru:2697: cakāraḥ sphuṭam etad ity arthaṃ dyotayati |
GSP28durdhpru:2698: kaḥ punar īdṛśo artho vivikṣita ity āha -- yatheti |
GSP28durdhpru:2699: anena bhūtārthaśabdenātra satyacatuṣṭayaṃ vivakṣitam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:2701: tathā 'nyasadbhūtārthaviṣayam api draṣṭavyam iti yathāśabdārtho 'py asti |
GSP28durdhpru:2703: ārāt pāpakebhyo dharmebhyo yātā ity āryāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2704: ata eva tāni satyatayā manyanta iti teṣāṃ satyāni |
GSP28durdhpru:2709: phalabhūtāḥ pañca sakleśas kandhā duḥkhākhyaṃ satyam ekam |
GSP28durdhpru:2710: ta eva hetubhūtās tṛṣṇāsahāyāḥ samudayākhyaṃ satyaṃ dvitīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2712: tadavasthāprāptihetunairātmyādyākāraś cittaviśeṣo mārgākhyaṃ satyaṃ caturtham iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2713: bhāvanāśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe bhūtasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:2715: lakṣyate ca bhūtaśabdasānnidhyāl lekhakena prathamapustake bhūśabdaḥ prakṣiptaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2716: tasyeti tu vacanaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vigrahaṃ darśayato dharmottarasya pāṭho 'nyathā yathābhūtaṃ vigrahaṃ darśayitukāmenārthapadopādāne kim akṣaragauravaṃ dṛṣṭam,
GSP28durdhpru:2717: yena kevalabhūtaśabdopādāne pratipattigauravaṃ likhanākauśalañ cāviṣkṛtam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2724: sampūrṇaṃ tu yadā tadā na asti prakarṣagatiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2726: tasmāt paryantād yaj jātaṃ bhāvyamānasya arthasya sannihitasya iva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:2727: tad iha sphuṭābhatvārambhāvasthā bhāvanāprakarṣaḥ | abhrakavyavahitam iva yadā bhāvyamānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:2728: yādṛśo yogināṃ bhāvanākramo viniścaye “śrutamaye“tyādinābhihito yathā bhāvanāprakarṣaviśadābhatvayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvas tatraiva “kāmaśoke“tyādinā darśitas tathehāpi draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2729: yādṛśaś cākāras teṣāṃ satyānām anityatvādike bhāvanīyo yāvat kālāvadhikā ca bhāvanā 'nekajamaparamparānuyātā,
GSP28durdhpru:2730: yac ca nibandhanaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ karuṇā bodhisattvānām,
GSP28durdhpru:2731: tad anyeṣāṃ saṃsārodvegas tad api sarvaṃ yathā pramāṇavārttike nirṇītaṃ tathehāpy anugantavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2732: iha tu yogijñāṇsya svrūpamātram upadarśayitum upakrāntam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2733: prakarṣaśabdena saha vigrahaṃ tasya cāryaṃ vivakṣitam āha -- bhāvanāyā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2735: sa ca yatsphuṭatvatadadhikasphuṭatvādinā rūpeṇa tajjñānasyodaya eva |
GSP28durdhpru:2736: paryantaśabdena vigrahaṃ tasya cārtham ācaṣṭe prakarṣasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:2738: kadā ca tasyāvasānam ity āha -- yadeti |
GSP28durdhpru:2739: yasmin kāle sphuṭābhatvaṃ bhāvanārthaṃ viṣayasya jñānasyeti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2740: idaṃ leśato 'sampūrṇaṃ bhavati yad a[na]ntaraṃ yogipratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyaṃ tasmin kāle prakarṣasya paryanto 'vasānaṃ jñātavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2741: tatkālopalakṣitaṃ tathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ paryanta ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2742: nanu prakarṣasya paryantaḥ sa yujyate yasmin sati prakarṣo nivarttate |
GSP28durdhpru:2745: tat katham ucyate kathañ ca paryantajaṃ yogijñānam,
GSP28durdhpru:2746: na tu tad eva paryanta ityāśaṅkyāha -- yāvad iti | hir yasmāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2747: sampūrṇe tu prakarṣagamanaṃ nāstīti darśayati -- sampūrnam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2753: parisamantād anta iti prādisamāsena niḥśeṣagamanam evocyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2754: tataḥ sa paryanta ucyate yad anantaraṃ prakarṣa(-kṛṣya)māṇena na bhavitavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2755: na tu yadarthaṃ yeṣāṃ prakarṣavatām udaya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2762: r anyajñānaṃ sphuṭatarākāragrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tadvad bhāvyamānārthasphuṭatarākāragrāhi yajjñānaṃ tadyoginaḥ pratyakṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:2763: uktam eva bhāvanāprakarṣārthaṃ tatparyantārthaṃ tajjñānaṃ copasaṃhāravyājena sukhapratipattyarthaṃ punar darśayati tad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2768: karatalāmalakavad bhāvyamānasya arthasya yad darśanaṃ tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:2771: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇac chabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2773: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ sampratyasat tadvat pūrvavinaṣṭajñānaviṣayatvam api samprati na asti vastunaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2774: tad asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhṇad asannihitārthagrāhivād asphuṭābham vikalpakam |
GSP28durdhpru:2777: abhrakenātisvacchatayā pāśa(rśva)to dvidhākarttum aśakyeneti prastāvād vyavahitam āvṛtaṃ tadiva |
GSP28durdhpru:2778: karasvarūpaṃ karatalaṃ sannihitasyevety anena yat pūrvam uktaṃ [30a] tasyāyam upasaṃhāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2780: tat punaḥ kathaṃ pratykṣam ity āśaṅkām apākarttuṃ pratykṣalakṣaṇena yogam asya darśayann āha tad dhīti | hir yasmāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2781: sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati, nirvikalpakaṃ tu kathaṃ yena pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āha -- sphuṭābhatvād eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:2782: co nirvikalpakam ity ataḥ paraḥ sphuṭābhatvāpekṣaikaviṣayatvaṃ nirvikalpakatvasya samuccinoti |
GSP28durdhpru:2783: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- śabdākārasaṃsargo hi sphuṭābhatvavirodhīti yady asāv abhaviṣyat tadā sphuṭābham eva nābhaviṣyad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2784: abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam eva sphuṭābahṃ bhavaiṣyati ko 'nayor virodha ity āśaṅkya vikalpetyādinā virodham eva darśyitum apakramate |
GSP28durdhpru:2786: vastv iti dṛśyamānaṃ yathā caitat tathā pūrvam eva viveditaṃ gṛṇīyād grahītum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:2789: bhavatu saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvasya tathātvam, kim ata ity āha -- yathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:2791: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi vādakākārasaṃsargino 'pi kathaṃ na sphuṭābhatvam ity āha -- tad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2794: asphuṭābhaṃ tu kutas tad ity āha -- asannnihitārthagrāhitvād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2796: pūrvavṛttadarśana viṣayatayā ca bhūtapūrvo bhāvo gṛhyamāno na sannihitarūpo bhāsate |
GSP28durdhpru:2799: asannihitaviṣayatvam eva tasya kuto 'vasīyata ity āha -- asadrūpam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2801: asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhyamāṇasya gṛhṇad iti hetau śatur vidhānād asadrūpagrahaṇād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2802: sphuṭābhatvād eveti yad avocat, tad evopasaṃharati tata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2804: anantaroktena krameṇa tatas tasmāt sphuṭābhatvād viśadābatvān nirvikalapakaṃ yogijñānam iti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2805: prayogaḥ -- yat saṅketakāladṛṣṭatayā vastusaṃsparśi jñānaṃ na tat sphuṭābham | yathā cira--
GSP28durdhpru:2807: pramāṇaśuddhārthagrāhitvāc ca saṃvādakam | ataḥ pratyakṣam | itarapratyakṣavat |
GSP28durdhpru:2813: tad evaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasye prakārabhedaṃ pratipādya viṣayavipratipattim nirākartum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2816: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:2819: vastuno hy āsādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvam asti sāmānyaṃ ca |
GSP28durdhpru:2820: tatra yad asādhāraṇam tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2825: na hi pūrvajñānaviṣayatvaṃ pūrvamsin nivṛtte vastuno 'sti |
GSP28durdhpru:2826: tad uttarakālabhāvinā jñājñānena pūrvajñānaviṣayatvam asannihitam eva vastunaḥ spṛśyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2829: asaty abhrātatve tu kathaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- pramāneti |
GSP28durdhpru:2833: caḥ [30b] saṃvādakam ity ataḥ paro nirvikalpatvena saha saṃvādakatvena saṃvādakatvaṃ saucchinoti,
GSP28durdhpru:2840: yad vā samādhigrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt prajñā ca vivekakaraṇaṣaśaktir draṣṭavyā |
GSP28durdhpru:2841: sa yasyāsti sa nityasamāhito vivekakaraṇatatparaś ca yogī |
GSP28durdhpru:2843: tad evam ityādy āheity etad antaṃ subodham |
GSP28durdhpru:2845: ka ity ākāṅkṣāyām āha -- svalakṣaṇam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2846: svaśabdasya lakṣaṇaśabdasya cārtham ācakṣāṇo vigragam upalakṣayati -- svam ityādinā |
GSP28durdhpru:2848: yasya yat svaṃ tat tasyaiva nānyasyeti lakṣaṇayā svaśabdenā sādhāraṇam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:2850: svaśabdayor artham abhidhāya tayoḥ samastaṃ padam āha -- svalakṣaṇaṃ iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2851: anena svam asādhāraṇaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ svarūpaṃ cet karmadhāryo darśitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2853: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya -- grāhyaś ca yadākāram utpadyate, prāpaṇīyaś ca yam adhyavasyati |
GSP28durdhpru:2856: adhyavaseyas tu pratyakṣabalotpannena niścayena santāna eva |
GSP28durdhpru:2859: tathā anumānam api svapratibhāse 'narthe 'rthādhyavasāyena pravṛtter anarthagrāhi |
GSP28durdhpru:2860: nanu sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇam arthavat |
GSP28durdhpru:2861: atra ca sarvasyaiva svarūpasyāsādhāraṇatvāt sambhava eva, na vyabhicāra iti kiṃ svaśabdena?
GSP28durdhpru:2862: evaṃ tu vaktavyam -- vasturūpaṃ tasya viṣaya ity āśaṅkayāha -- vastuna iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2867: sati caivaṃ dvairūpye kiṃ pūrvaṃ rūpam,
GSP28durdhpru:2868: atha paraṃ pratyakṣaya viṣaya iti sandehe -- yad asādhāraṇaṃ tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam ucyata iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2869: grāhyam iti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:2870: syād etat -- pravṛttiviṣaya eva pramāṇasya viṣayas tataḥ pravṛttiviṣayas tasya viṣaya iti vaktavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2871: tat kiṃ grāhyam ity ucyata ity āha -- dvividha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2876: bhedam upapādayati -- yadākāraṃ yatpratibhāsaṃ jñānam utpadyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2878: dvayor api svajñāne prakāśanam asty eveti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2880: tato jñānād yatra pravarttata iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:2882: nanu grāhyādhyavaseyaśabdayor eva bhedo na tv arthasya |
GSP28durdhpru:2883: yato yad eva prakāśate tad evādhyavasīyate, tat kiṃ evaṃ uyata ity āha -- anyo hīti |
GSP28durdhpru:2886: kasya kīdṛśo grāhya itaro vety āha -- pratyakṣasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:2887: hir avadhāraṇe eka ity asmāt paro draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2890: atha kiṃ pratyakṣam avasāyātmakaṃ yena tasyāsāv avaseya ity āha -- pratyakṣeti |
GSP28durdhpru:2891: pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino niśacayasya pratyakṣagṛhīta eva pravṛttatayā 'natiśayādhānena yat tenādhyavasitaṃ tat pratyakṣeṇaivāvasitam iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2892: nanu grāhyād anyaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasyoktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2894: tad ayaṃ tṛtīyo viṣayaḥ prāpta ity āha -- santāna eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:2897: grāhya eva kasmān na tena prāpyata ity āha -- lakṣāṇāsyeti (ity āha -- kṣaṇasyeti) |
GSP28durdhpru:2898: yadākaraṃ pratyakṣam utpadyate tasya kṣaṇasyeti prastāvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2899: evañ ca vivṛṇvato 'sya pramāṇasyety atra pratyakṣābhiprāyeṇa pramāṇaśabda indriyajāpratyakṣavivakṣayā draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2901: atha bhavatv ekaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viṣayadvaividhyavad, anumānaṃ tu kathaṃ tathāvidham? pramāṇasyeti ca
GSP28durdhpru:2903: sa punar āropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇatvena avasīyate yataḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:2906: tad atra pramāṇasya grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2907: bruvatā tad api viṣayadvaividhyavad abhyupagam eva ity āśaṅkyāha -- tatheti |
GSP28durdhpru:2908: yena pratibhāsādhyavasāyalakṣaṇena prakāreṇa pratyakṣam anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyi tathā tena prakāreṇeti tathāśadārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2911: kin tv anumānam apy anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyīty apiśabdenāha |
GSP28durdhpru:2912: ihaiva cchedaḥ karttavyo 'nyathā vyākhyānam asamañjasaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2915: katham upapadyata ity āśaṅkyopapattim āha -- svapratibhāsa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2920: athānarthe svapratibhāse 'rthādhyavasāyenānumānavikalpo 'nyo vā pravarttaka iti kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28durdhpru:2921: svaprtibhāsasyāropyamāṇasya cārthasyāvasīyamānasya vivekaṃ na prtipadyata ity utkaṃ bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:2922: na hi tenaiva vivekapratipattiḥ, tena svapratibhāsasya tathātvenāvikalpanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2926: tasyāpi tathā pravṛttitayā pūrvavikapapratibhāsāsaṃsparśād ity alam iha vistareṇa |
GSP28durdhpru:2927: yady evaṃ ko 'syādhyavasīyamānaḥ prāpaṇīyo viṣaya ity āha -- sa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2930: artha iti artha ivārtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ pratīyamānas tasmin jñāne prakāśamāna iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:2932: tad anenānumāsya grāhyādhyavaseyau bhedena sādhyarthyād abhidhāya sukhapratipattyarthaṃ tāv eva kaṇṭhokau karoti -- tata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2933: yataḥ svalakṣaṇatvena tasyāvasāyas tataḥ [31b] svalakṣaṇam avasitaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya |
GSP28durdhpru:2934: svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity etad apy abhimānād abhidhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2936: tadviṣayatve tasya niraṃśatvāt kṣaṇikatvāder apy avasitāv anumānānavatāraprasaṅgāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2940: tuḥ prāpaṇiyād viṣayād grāhyaṃ bhedavantaṃ darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:2941: tasmin jñāne prakāśamāne prakāśanād anartho grāhya uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2942: syād etat -- yady avasitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ pravṛttiviṣayo 'numānasya tadā katham eṣa dharmottaro viniśacayaṭīkāyāṃ avadīt “avasitaś cākāro vikalpānāṃ grāhyaḥ” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2943: evaṃ hi svalakṣaṇam eva grāhyaṃ samarthitaṃ syān nānartha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2946_0: tathā hi praramārthato vikalpānām ārotpitam eva rūpam avaseyaṃ grāhyam tathāpi vyavaharttāra
GSP28durdhpru:2946_1: āropitam eva rūpam avṛkṣavyāvṛttam avasyanto bāhyasyāpi tathātvād bāhyaṃ vṛkṣam avasyāma ity abhimanyante,
GSP28durdhpru:2949: tad anurodhāt svalakṣaṇam avasitam ity ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2950: tasyaiva tv āropitasya paramārtho 'numeyasya pratibhāsamānaṃ kevalam ākāram āśritya grāhyatvam ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2951: tatas tatra vāstavāvasitarūpābhiprāyeṇa tathābhidhānāt ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:2953: yasmāt pramāṇasya dvididho viṣayo grāhyādhyavsasāyabhedena tat tasmāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2954: atra viṣayavipratipattinirākaraṇākāle grāhyaṃ viṣayaṃ darśayateti bruvan viṣayaśabdenācāryasya grāhyo viṣayo 'bhipreta iti sphuṭati |
GSP28durdhpru:2955: syād etat -- na vai grāhyaviṣayāpekṣaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam upapadyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2961: na ca yena yasyāprāpaṇaṃ tasya tatra prāmāṇyam abhyupeyate, atiprasaṅgāpatteḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2963: anumānsyāpi vahnyādyadhyavasāyitayā tathotpattir eva tatprāpaṇam ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2965: kasya nāma jñānasya savikalpasya nirvikalpakasya vā tattadākāratayotpattir nāsti yena tasya prāṇāṇyaṃ na syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2966: tasmān na dvididho viṣayaḥ pramāṇasyābhidhānīyo 'pi tv eka eva pravṛttiviṣayākhyo viṣayaḥ khyāpanīya iti |

GSP28durdhpru:3487: yamātsvasāmarthyotpannenānurūpeṇa niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpitaṃ tathā vahavati nānyathā tasmāt kāraṇād adhyavasāyam anurūpaṃ niścayaṃ kurvat |
GSP28durdhpru:3489: amum evārthaṃ vyatirekamukhena draḍhyann āha -- akṛte tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3491: bhavatu tathā 'vyavasthāpitaṃ kim ata ity āha -- tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3493: tad aniṣpattāv api kiṃ na pramāṇam ity āha -- ata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3498: sā cen na niṣpannā tarhi kim apekṣya sādhakatamatvam ātmasātkuryāt,
GSP28durdhpru:3500: nanu avasāyābhāve tāvad iyaṃ gatis tadbhāve 'pi yady eṣaiva gatis tadā na pratyakṣaṃ nāma pramāṇam ity āśaṅkyānvayamukhenedānīm āha -- janiteneti |
GSP28durdhpru:3502: tena tathāvyavasthāpyamāne vyavasthāpakatve ca nimittam āha -- sārūpyavaśād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3504: yadi pratyakṣaṃ kevalam asahāyaṃ pravarttayitum anīśanaṃ niyamena niścayam apekṣate tarhi tat sahitam eva pramāṇaṃ prasajyetety abhiprāyavān prāha -- yady evam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3505: evam anantaroktaṃ yady abhyupagamyate tadaivaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3508: evaṃ saty etan na bhavati | hetum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3510: vikalpayanta utprekṣāmahe na tu paśyāma ity utprekṣātmakaṃ vikalpavyāpāram anubhavād adhyavasyanti |
GSP28durdhpru:3511: tasmāt svavyāpāraṃ tiraskṛtya pratyakṣavyāpāram ādarśayati yatra arthe pratyakṣapūrvako 'dhyavasāyas tatra pratyakṣaṃ kevalam eva pramāṇam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3514: [41] pramāṇam iti nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:3517: pramāṇam iti ācāryadharottaraviracitāyāṃ nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:3525: tataḥ svavyāpāraviśiṣṭārthādhyavasāne tasya kā kṣatir ity āśaṅkyāha -- darśanañ ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3527: yady evaṃ kas tarhi vikalpavyāpāra ity āha -- utprekṣaṇam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3528: etad eva tathā hītyādinā 'vasyantīty anena (-ty antena) granthena samarthayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3529: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi kathaṃ pratyakṣasya kevalasya prāmāṇyaṃ na tu vikalpasyāpīty āśaṅkyopasaṃhārāpadeśenāha -- tasmād iti | etac ca subodham |
GSP28durdhpru:3531: syāt khalu vikalpasyāpi prāṇaṇyaṃ yady asau svavyāpārayukta eva pratyakṣasya sāhāyyaṃ bhajate |
GSP28durdhpru:3534: sa ca darśanalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva sampādita iti katham ayam api piṣṭapeṣaṇakārī prāmāṇyaṃ pratilabheta |
GSP28durdhpru:3535: atha pratyakṣaṃ tāvat svaprāmāṇyavyavahārāya tam apekṣate |
GSP28durdhpru:3536: tataḥ so 'pi pramāṇam eveti matis tarhi pitā pitṛvyavahārāyāvaśyaṃ putram apekṣata iti putro 'pi pitā prasajyata iti kṛtam atārkikavacanavicāraṇayeti
GSP28durdhpru:3540: [DhPr p.87] II K A P I T E L
GSP28durdhpru:3542: evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya anumānaṃ vyākhyātum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3545: atha anumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kim akasmāt prakārabhedaḥ kathyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3548: tayor atyantabhedāt na ekam lakṣaṇam asti |
GSP28durdhpru:3549: tatas tayoh pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇam ākhyātuṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3551: vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate vaktum |
GSP28durdhpru:3554: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanam antareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3557: yathoddeśam adhunā 'numānaṃ vyākhyātum avasaraprāptam ity abhisandhāyāha -- evam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3559: prakāre dhāpratyayo 'yam iti darśayann āha -- dviprakāram iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3560: nanu cānumānasya lakṣaṇaṃ vaktukāmenāsya lakṣaṇam eva vaktavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3561: tat kim idam aprastutābhidhānam āsthīyata iti pūrvapakṣam -- arthetyādinotthāpayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3567: yathā caturṇām api pratyakṣāṇāṃ jñānarūpatvād ekaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvādisādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sambhavati,
GSP28durdhpru:3568: tathā yadi syāt pratyakṣaval lakṣaṇam eva prathamam uktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3571: nanu prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyaktiviśeṣopadarśanaṃ vinā na śakyate darśayitum iti vyaktibheda eva kathayitavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3572: tat kiṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyata ity āha -- prakāreti |
GSP28durdhpru:3574: yadi tasmin darśite 'pi pratiniyatalakṣaṇākhyānaṃ na śakyaṃ tarhi kiṃ tena kathitenety āha -- vyaktīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3576: pratiśabdo 'tra niyatārthavṛttiḥ, tena prati viśiṣṭā vyaktis tatra niyatam iti,
GSP28durdhpru:3578: kim punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3585: yad vā niyataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇāṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum |
GSP28durdhpru:3586: kva ca niyatam ity āśaṅkyoktaṃ -- prativyaktīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3590: etena yac codyate “lakṣaṇamātre kathite viśiṣṭalakṣaṇam anumānam ekam anekaṃ vā 'stu |
GSP28durdhpru:3591: kiṃ tasya prakārabhedakathanena” iti tat parihṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:3592: yadi hi sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam abhipretyedam uyate tadā tan nāstīti kiṃ kathyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:3593: atha viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tad api vyaktibhedakathanam antareṇa vaktuṃ yadi śakyeta kiṃ na kathyta |
GSP28durdhpru:3595: ata evādāv eva tad abhidhānaṃ nyāyyam, na tu paścād iti darśayitum āha -- aśakyatām iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3599: syād etat -- svārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ parārthānumānam evaṃlakṣaṇam iti kiṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na śakyate vaktum?
GSP28durdhpru:3600: evam api kim anumānadvaitaṃ nāveditaṃ bhavati yena sasaṃkhyeyā saṃkhyā -- anumānaṃ dvidhā svārthaṃ parārthaṃ cety ucyata iti? satyam etat |
GSP28durdhpru:3601: kevalaṃ niyamārtham etad vibhāgavacanam iti brūmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3602: anumānaṃ dvidhā -- dvidhaivaivam ātmakam iti kathaṃ nāma[37b] pratīyeteti |
GSP28durdhpru:3603: itaratheha tāvad etāvad eva vyutpādyatayā prastutam,
GSP28durdhpru:3604: anyatra punar anyad apy anumānaṃ vyutpādyam astīty āśaṅkā nāhatya nirākṛtā syād iti ||
GSP28durdhpru:3605: pūrvavaccheṣavadādirūpeṇa anyathā 'pi dvaividhyasambhavāt saṃśayānaḥ pṛcchati -- kiṃ punar iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3614: yenānumānena karaṇabhūtenānumātā svayaṃ pratipadyate parokṣam artham iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3617: ayam āśayaḥ -- trirūpaliṅgasya jñānaṃ yasya santāna utpadyate tat tadartham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3620: na tu kiñcij jñānaṃ kvacit puṃsi niyatam asti |
GSP28durdhpru:3622: yena svayaṃ pratipadyata iti bruvataś cāyam abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3623: yady api pratipattir anumānajñānātmikā tathāpy ekasyāpi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanabhāvena kriyākaraṇabhedo darśita iti sārūpyabhāgaḥ karaṇam anumānam,
GSP28durdhpru:3626: tatra svārthaṃ trirūpāl liṅgād yad anumeye jñānaṃ tad anumānam II-3
GSP28durdhpru:3627: tatra tayoḥ svārthaparārthānumānayor madhye svārthaṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ viśiṣṭam ity āha -- trirūpād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3628: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasya vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇāni tat trirūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3630: parārtham ity asya vigraham āha -- parasmāy iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3633: asya ca parapratipattḥ prayojanam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3635: yena vākyena karaṇena paraṃ prati vācyaṃ pratipādyati parokṣam arthaṃ bodhayati tat trirūpalaiṅgākhyānaṃ vākyaṃ parārtham anumānam |
GSP28durdhpru:3636: atrāpy ayam asyābhiprāyaḥ -- yady api abhidhānarūpam apy anumānaṃ na niyataṃ puṃsi tathā 'pi tat parārtham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3637: tathā hi yad yad uddiśya pravarttate tat tad artham ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3638: param uddiśya pravarttate ca śabdo nātmānam |
GSP28durdhpru:3640: prayoktṛsamīhāviṣyasyārthasya para eva prayojako yasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3642: sākṣād anayor vyāpārabhedād iti ca draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3643: nanu ca parārthānumānotpādakavākyavad asti kiñcid vākyaṃ yat parapratyakṣopayogi |
GSP28durdhpru:3645: ataḥ parārthānumānavat parārthaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kiṃ na vyutpādyata iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3646: atrocdyate -- parokṣārthapratipatter yā sāmagrī -- liṅgasya pakṣadharmatā sādhyavyāptiś ca -- tadākhyānād vākyam upacārataḥ parārthānumānam ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3647: na tu tatra karthañcid aṅgabhāvamātreṇa, svāsthyāder api tathā prasaṅgāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3648: idaṃ punaḥ `ayaṃ kalabhaḥ' ityādivākyaṃ na pratyakṣotpatter yā sāmagrīndriyālokādi tadabhidhānāt tannimittaṃ bhavat tathā vyapadeśam aśnute yena vyutpādyatām apy aśnuvīta |
GSP28durdhpru:3650_0: yathā kathañcit parapratyakṣotpattāv aṅgabhāvamātreṇa tādrūpye netrotsave vastuni
GSP28durdhpru:3650_1: sannihite 'pi kathañcit parāṅmukhasya pareṇa yad abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ [38a]śirasas tad
GSP28durdhpru:3650_2: api vacanātmakaṃ parārthapratyakṣaṃ vyutpādayitur vyutpādyam āpadyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:3651: etac ca kaḥ svasthātmā manasi niveśayet |
GSP28durdhpru:3652: kiñ ca bhavatu tathāvidhaṃ vacanaṃ parārthaṃ pratyakṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:3653: kiṃ naś chinnam? tasyāpi vyutpādanārthasyāvyutpādanāt pramāda eva mahatī kṣtir iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:3656: na tu kecit tathāvidhe vacane parārthapratyakṣopayogini vipratipadyante |
GSP28durdhpru:3658: parārthānumāne[42]............... vastu pratipadyamānā api taddharmavyāptivyatirekābhyāṃ nigadanto dṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3660: upanayasādhyatadāvṛttivacanānāñ ca prayogād iti tad vyutpādyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3661: yadi tu tatrāpi na vipratipadyeran pare tadā tad api naiva vyutpāditaṃ syād,
GSP28durdhpru:3666: iha yathaiva svayaṃ pratipannaḥ parokṣārthas tathaiva parasmai partipādyata iti svārthāṇumānapūrvakatvāt prarārthānumānasya prathamaṃ svārthānumānam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:3667: yathoddeśam eva ca lakṣaṇapraṇeyam iti svārthānumānasyaivaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3670: tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgāt yat jātaṃ jñānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3672: tat trirūpāt ca liṅgāt trirūpaliṅgālambhanam apy utpadyata iti viśinaṣṭi -- anumeya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3674: trirūpāl liṅgāt yad utpannam anumeyālambhanam jñānam tat svārtham anumānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3677: pramāṇasya yat phalaṃ tasya vā vyavasthā sā atra anumāne 'pi pratyakṣa iva pratyakṣavat veditavyā |
GSP28durdhpru:3678: lakṣaṇaṃ tatretyādinā ''dita upadiṣṭam ācāryeṇa tad vyācaṣṭe tatreti |
GSP28durdhpru:3680_0: tasmāt trirūpāl liṅgād yaj jātam iti vyācakṣāṇo mūle trirūpāl liṅgād iti yā pañcamī
GSP28durdhpru:3680_1: sā gamyamānajanikriyāpekṣayā “janikarttuḥ prakṛtiḥ” [pāṇini 1.4.30] ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād
GSP28durdhpru:3682: trirūpāl liṅgād iti cācakṣāṇenācāryeṇaikadvipadavyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣīṃ pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam abhipretaṃ prakāśitam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3683: yathā caitat tathā bhaṭṭārcaṭanibandhanam arcaṭālokasaṃjñitaṃ vidhāsyanto vistareṇa spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3687: trirūpaliṅgālambanam iti dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnināntarīyaka iti jñānaṃ vācyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3688: tad dhi paramparayā trirūpāl liṅgāj jātam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3691: kim punar viśiṣyata ity āha -- etac ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3695: anumeyo dharmadharmisamudāyaḥ ālambyata ity ālambanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3696: itir vākyārthaparisamāptau evam arthaḥ san nāpareṇa sambaddhyate -- evam uktena pakāreṇā lakṣaṇavipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyeti ||
GSP28durdhpru:3697: nanu ca pramāṇasya phalam iti yady ācāryasya vivakṣitaṃ dharmottareṇa caivaṃ vyākhyāyate tadā pramāṇabhāgavyavasthāyāṃ kim uktam ācāryeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:3698: dharmottareṇāpi `nīlasārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetuḥ pramāṇam' ity upariṣṭāt [pṛ-91] kim iti darśayiṣyate iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:3702: yathā hi nīlasarūpaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3705: tadvad anumānaṃ nīlākāram utpadyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:3708: sārūpyavaṣād dhi tan nīlapratītirūpam siddhyate | na anyathā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3713: trairūpyaṃ punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:3714: asapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam II-5
GSP28durdhpru:3716: liṅgasya yat trairūpyaṃ yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tat idam ucyate iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3717: kiṃ punas tat trairūpyam ity āha -- anumeyaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:3718: tasmin liṅgasya sattvam eva niścitam -- ekaṃ rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3719: yady api ca atra niścitagrahaṇam na kṛtaṃ tathā api ante kṛtaṃ prakrāntayor dvayor api rūpayor apekṣaṇīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3720: yato na yogyatayā liṅgaṃ parokṣajñānasya nimittam | yathā
GSP28durdhpru:3723: etac copalakṣaṇaṃ tena phalasya sādhanaṃ ca yat tasyāpi yā vyavasthā sā 'pi gṛhyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3726: ata eva niścayaḥ -- “na parmāṇaphalayor viṣayabhdedaḥ” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3736: na tu viṣayavipratipattir ity āha -- evam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3737: evam anantaroktena prakāreṇa ihānumānaparicchede nirākṛtā iti śeṣaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3738: vakṣyamāṇaṃ vā nīrākṛteti padaṃ vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3739: traiprūyam ityādigranthasya yata utthānam, tat lakṣaṇetyādinā darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3740: prasaṅgena prastāv ena yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tāny eva tathety āvedayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3741: tat idaṃ trairūpyam iti prakṛtatvāt śeṣo 'dhyāhāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3745: kasmāt punas tad apekṣanīyam ity āha --yata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3748: kasmān na tathety āha -- adṛṣṭād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3751: liṅgaṃ na parokṣajñānanimittaṃ tarhi pakṣadharmatayā jñātam evāstu parokṣaprakāśanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3758: tasmāt parokṣārthanāntarīyakatayā niścayanam eva liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3760: ato 'nvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvaniścayo liṅgavyāpārātmakatvād avaśyakartavya iti sarveṣu rūpeṣu niścitagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3764: pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3765: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṅkocabhājaḥ kin tu kecid eva | sattvavacanasya
GSP28durdhpru:3766: tat kim anvayavyatirekaniścayena tasya? ity āśakyāha -- nāpīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3775: parokṣasya vahnyāder nāntarīyako 'vinābhāvītasya bhāvas tattā tayā niścayanam -- sarvatrāyam etad avinābhāvīti vikalpanam |
GSP28durdhpru:3778: evakāreṇa vyavacchinnam evānyasya tad vyāpārārarūpatvaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ nāpara ity anenānūditam |
GSP28durdhpru:3779: yat punar atrāpy ayam etan nāntarīyaka iti jñāṇaṃ tad anumānajñānam iti jñeyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3781: ataḥ sattvenāniścitāl liṅgād aniścitasambandhāc cāpratipatteḥ kāraṇād anvayādiniściyo 'vaśyakarttavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3782: tathāpi kathaṃ karttaya ity āśaṅkya vyatirekamukheṇoktam eva hetum anvyayamukhenāpi darśayann āha -- liṅgeti |
GSP28durdhpru:3783: liṅgavyāpārasya parokṣapratipādane gamakavyāpārasyātmā sa eva tatheti svārthikaḥ kan karttavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3784: tasya bhāvas tasmād iti hetupadaṃ kṛṭvā 'yam upasaṃhāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3786: sampraty ekaikasya rūpasya yad vyāvarttyaṃ tat krameṇa darśayitum āha -- tatreti |
GSP28durdhpru:3789: yathā tu prabhedo yathā vāntarbhāvas tathopariṣṭād vakṣyāmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3791: athāpi syāt svāpavat dhūmo 'py ayam ekadeśāsiddha eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3792: tathā hi parvatādir iha pakṣas tatra ca kvacid eva deśe siddho na sarvatra |
GSP28durdhpru:3794: athaivaṃvidho 'pi pakṣavyāpaka ucyate tarhi svāpena kim aparāddhaṃ yenāsāv evaiko na yukta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3796: paścāt kṛtena evakāreṇa asādhāraṇo dharmo nirastaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3797: yadi hi anumeya eva sattvam iti kuryāt śrāvaṇatvam eva hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3799: sapakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ | tasminn eva sattvam niścitam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam | iha api
GSP28durdhpru:3802: yaś cāsau parvatādis tatra na vahnir jijñāsitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3804: tatraikadeśasthadhūmadarśane 'py ekadeśavahnir jijñāsito jñāyata iti kiṃ sarvaparvatavyāpinā dhūmena kāryam?
GSP28durdhpru:3805: yadi punaḥ sarvatraiva vahnimattvaṃ jijñāsitaṃ syāt, syād evāyaṃ pakṣaikadeśāsiddhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3808: atra punaḥ sarveṣām eva tarūṇāṃ caitanyaṃ jijñāsitam iti sakalapādapavyāpinaiva svāpena prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:3809: yathā vedasya sarvasyaiva pauruṣeyatve sādhye sakalāmnāyavyāpakenaiva vākyatvena paryojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:3812: eke tu -- lokādhyavasāyasiddhaṃ mahīdharāder ekatvam avalambyāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:3813: na ca sarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ tathaikatvaṃ loko 'dhyavasyati,
GSP28durdhpru:3816: athābhidhīyate -- yadi kaścit tintiṅkāprabhṛtīn eva pādapān pakṣayitvā svāpaṃ hetūkaroti,
GSP28durdhpru:3817: tadā 'yaṃ na pakṣaikadeśāsiddha iti kiṃ na sādhayec caitanyam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3819: yadi sarvajanaprasiddha indriyavyāpāravirodhyavasthāviśeṣaḥ svāpo nidrāparanāmā hetur abhipretas tadā 'yaṃ teṣv api taruṣv asddha iti kathaṃ caitanyam anumāpayet?
GSP28durdhpru:3820: atha yena kenacid upādhinā svāpaśabdamātravācyo 'rtho hetuḥ;
GSP28durdhpru:3822: “ṣaṣṭhy atasarthapratyeyana” [pāṇini 2.3.30] ity anena paścācchabdayoge sattvavacanāt ṣaṣṭhī |
GSP28durdhpru:3826: pūrvāvadhāraṇe tu nāyaṃ nirākṛtaḥ syād iti darśayati yadīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3828: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady anumeya eva sattvaṃ yasyeti lakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadā sapakṣa eva sattvam iti vacanam atiricyamānaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati |
GSP28durdhpru:3831: sandigdhaś cāsāv asya hetutvena viśeṣaṇatvena cāsiddho 'niścitaśabdeti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3835: yathā 'nayor bhedo yathā cāntarbhāvas tathā parastāt pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3836: ihāśritatvādārthena nyāyena hetusattvasya viśeṣaṇarūpatvād anena sahoditi(ta)
GSP28durdhpru:3842: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate kin tu ubhayatra api |
GSP28durdhpru:3843: sattvagrahaṇāt pūrvāvadhāraṇavacanena sapakṣāvyāpisattākasya api prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam |
GSP28durdhpru:3844: paścādavadhāraṇe tv ayam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe sattvam eva yasya sa hetur iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3849: tasminn asattvam eva niścitam -- tṛtīyaṃ rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3853: prayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye hy anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādau asti, ākāśādau na asti |
GSP28durdhpru:3855: asattvaśabdād dhi pūrvasminn avadhāraṇe 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- vipakṣa eva yo na asti sa hetuḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3857: sādhāraṇaś cāsau sapkṣāsapakṣavṛttitvād anaikāntikaś caikasmin sādhye viparyaye vā 'vyavasthitaś ceti tathā nirasta iti varttate |
GSP28durdhpru:3859: prayatnānantarīyakatvam apy anityatvasiddhau samartho hetur iti darśayituṃ sakalasapakṣāvyāpi prayatnānantarīyakatvam udāhṛtam iti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3860: vastutas tu sarva eva kāryahetur dhūmādiḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir boddhavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3862: evaṃ sati prayatnānantarīyakatvam upalakṣaṇatvād asya dhūmādikam api na hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3864_0: ihāśrayatvādārthena nyāyena sapakṣalakṣaṇasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyatvād anena sahodito
GSP28durdhpru:3864_1: nipātaḥ pakṣe vṛkṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇatvād asapakṣalakṣaṇadharmyanatarayogasya
GSP28durdhpru:3865: tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- asapakṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3867: katham asya nirāsa ity āha -- viruddho hīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3870: kasmin sādhye kin tad īdṛśam ity āha -- prayatneti |
GSP28durdhpru:3878: nanu ca sapakṣa eva sattvam ity ukte vipakṣe 'sattvam eva iti gamyata eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3879: tat kimarthaṃ punar ubhayor upādānaṃ kṛtam? ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3880: anvayo vyatireko vā [prayujyamānaḥ] niyamavān eva prayoktavyo na anyathā iti darśayituṃ dvayor apy upādānaṃ kṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:3881: aniyate hi dvayor api prayoge 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe yo 'sti vipakṣe ca yo na asti sa hetur iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3882: tathā ca sati sa śyāmaḥ tatputratvāt dṛśyamānaputravad
GSP28durdhpru:3884: asapakṣa eveti kiṃ nāvadhāryata ity āha tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3891: tathā hi -- ya eva vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivad abhimataṃ na sādhayet |
GSP28durdhpru:3892: yaḥ punar mahatā 'pi prayatnena mṛgyamāṇo 'sapakṣe nopalakṣitaḥ sa katham aṅga sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti? tad etad avadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3893: yato yo 'pi vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ so 'pi iṣṭo duṣṭaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3894: kathaṃ? sādhyaṃ vinā 'py upalabdher iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:3895: nanu yadi nāmāsau sādhyam antareṇānyatra dṛṣṭas tathāpi vivādādhyāsite dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ kiṃ na sādhayati?
GSP28durdhpru:3896: na hi ayam atrāpi sādhyaṃ vinaiva varrtata iti prasādhakaṃ pramāṇam asti |
GSP28durdhpru:3897: na caikatra yena vinā yo dṛṣṭaḥ sarvatrāsau tena vinaiva varttate iti siddham |
GSP28durdhpru:3899: atha sādhyam antareṇa yo vṛttaḥ sādhye saty evāsau varttata iti niyamābhāvād vivādādhyāsite sandehahetur na samyag hetur bhavitum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:3900: hanta tarhi vipakṣe tasya sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyavinākṛtāṃ vṛttiṃ sambhāvayad hetum aniściyahetūkarotīti āyātam |
GSP28durdhpru:3901: sati caivaṃ sādhyaviparyaye hetusattābādhakapramāṇādarśanam api -- yady ayaṃ ca dharmo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28durdhpru:3902: na ca tataḥ sādhyam ity evaṃ vidhāṃ vṛttim asya -- sambhāvayati tadā kim ayaṃ niścayahetur bhavitum arhati?
GSP28durdhpru:3903: tato vi[40a]pakṣe darśanaṃ vā tathā śaṅkābījam astu viparyaye vā bādhakapramāṇādarśanaṃ veti ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:3904: tathā cāha vārttikakāraḥ -- “na tu sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā niśiyāpekṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:3906: so 'niścaye 'pi tulya iti tathāvidhodbhāvanam apy atra dūṣaṇam eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3907: tathā vipakṣapracārāśaṅkāvyavacchedena labhyaṃ gamakatvaṃ katham ātmasātkuryād” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3909: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti gamyata iti brubato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3910: pakṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti khalu samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇo 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3911: ayaṃ cāsapakṣe 'sattve 'niścite sandigdhe vā na ghaṭata iti avaśyam asapakṣe 'sattvam eva
GSP28durdhpru:3914: tasmān niyamavator eva anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo yena pratibandho gamyeta sādhanasya sādhyena |
GSP28durdhpru:3915: niyamavatoś ca prayoge 'vaśyakartavye dvayor eka eva prayoktavyo na dvāv iti niyamavān eva anvayo vyatireko vā prayoktavya iti śikṣaṇārthaṃ dvayor upādānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3916: trairūpyakathanaprasaṅgena anumeyaḥ sapakṣo vipakṣaś ca uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3921: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asyāsapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam ity anena sapakṣe vṛttimātraṃ labdham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3922: tenaiva ca prayojanam iti kiṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam ity aneneti drṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3924: sādhyenānvīyamānatvaṃ tayeva sādhye bhavitṛtvaṃ sādhanasya svagato dharmo 'nvayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3925: sādhyābhāve vyatiricyamānatvam abhavitṛtvaṃ hetoḥ savagato dharmo vyatirekaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3926: sa cāsaś ca[44]prayujyamānaḥ śabdena pratipādyamāṇo niyamavān avyabhicāravān prayoktavyo 'nyathā parokṣapratīty aṅga noktaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3928: yadā 'nvayavākye sādhye niyataṃ sādhanaṃ vyatirekavākye ca sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3932: [44] `prayujyamānaḥ' iti pāṭḥaḥ mūle nopalabhyate | pradīpānurodhāt tatra koṣṭḥake sthāpitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3934: aniyamenāpi prayoge yady anvayavyatirekayos tādṛśoḥ pratītir asti tadā kiṃ niyamavat prayogeṇety āha -- aniyate hīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3936: āstāṃ tāvad ekasya prayoge dvayor apy ayam arthaḥ syād ity apiśabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3939: kā kṣatir ity āha -- tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3940: kākatālīyanyāyena cāśyāmeṣu nikaṭavarttiṣu atatputreṣu etad draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3941: anyathā hy aniyato 'pi vyatireko 'tra nokta iti vacanāvakāśaḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3942: yata evaṃ tasmād yena niyamavatprayogeṇa partibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam |
GSP28durdhpru:3945: yady evam ekasminn eva sādhanavākye niyamavān evānvayo vyatirekaś ca prayujyatām ity āha -- niyamavatoś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3947: ayam āśayaḥ -- anvayavākyenāpi tathāprayuktena sāmarthyād vyatirekasya,
GSP28durdhpru:3948: vyatirekavākyenāpi sāmarthyād anvayasya prakāśanāt kiṃ pratītapratyāyakena dvitīyavākyena kāryam iti?
GSP28durdhpru:3953: anena prayo[40b]gasamāsa eva darśito na rūpasamāsa iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:3954: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt kaścit prayogabhaṅgyaiva svayam api parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti svārthe 'py anumāne nirṇītam idaṃ lakṣaṇakathanaprasaṅgena |
GSP28durdhpru:3961: vyāptiniścayakāle tu dharmo anumeya iti darśayitum atragrahanam |
GSP28durdhpru:3962: jijñāsito jñātum iṣṭo viśeṣo dharmo yasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3966: samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ pakṣeṇa sa pakṣa ukta upacārāt samānaśabdena viśiṣyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3967: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ, samānasya ca saśabdādeśaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3968: nanu yadi dharmadharmisamudāyo mukhyo 'numeyo 'tra gṛhyate tadā na kasyacit sādhanasya taddharmatvaṃ grahītuṃ śakyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:3969: grahaṇe vā vyaktam eva vaiyarthyam ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- tatra ka iti teṣu madhye |
GSP28durdhpru:3972: tasmiṃś tasmin kāle 'numeyaikadeśatvād upacārato draṣṭavyam | tad uktam --
GSP28durdhpru:3975: atha yad saha pakṣeṇa varttate iti sapakṣo 'bhipretas tadā 'rthāsaṅgatiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3976: athāpi samānaḥ pakṣeṇeti mataṃ tadā pakṣasamāna iti prāpnotīty abhipretya pṛcchati ka iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3982: nanu samānaś cāsau pakṣaś ceti kiṃ nābhipretam?
GSP28durdhpru:3983: tatra pakṣa evāsau dṛṣṭāntadharmī kathaṃ yena samānaśabdena viśiṣyata ity āha -- pakṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3984: katham anyārthena tena śabdena sa tathocyatām ity āha -- upacārād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3986: tatra so 'rthaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ iti yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3988: sa upacārād yaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ viśi(śe)ṣyate vyavacchedyate tadasamānāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3989: yadi samānaśabdo viśeṣaṇam asya tarhi saśabdaśrutiḥ katham ity āha -- samānasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:3990: samānasya samānaśabdasya sthāne saśabdādeśaś ca “samānasya” [pāṇini 6.3.84] iti yogavibhāgāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3991: samānaḥ pakṣo yasya sa tatheti bahuvrīhiḥ kim iti dharmottareṇa nāśrito yenaivam ātmā prayāsita iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:3995: syāt etat -- kiṃ tat pakṣasapakṣayoḥ sāmānyaṃ yena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ pakṣena ity āha -- sādhyadharmasāmānyena iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3996: sādhyaś ca asau asiddhatvāt, dharmaś ca parāśritatvāt sādhyadharmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3997: na ca viśeṣaḥ sādhyaḥ, api tu sāmānyaṃ |
GSP28durdhpru:3999: sādhyadharmaś ca asau sāmānyaṃ ca iti sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣeṇa sapakṣa iti arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4002: na sapakṣo 'sapakṣaḥ | sapakṣo yo na bhavati so 'sapakṣaḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:4005: viniścaye hi navapakṣadharmapravedananirdeśaprakaraṇe[44*]sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣas tad abhāvo 'sapakṣaC ity uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:4006: ato vārttikakārasyeva dṛṣṭāntadharmī pakṣo 'bhipreta upacārād ity atrāpy evam ayaṃ vyācaṣṭa ity adoṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4010: yena sāmānyena pakṣeṇa samānaḥ sapakṣa ity āheti yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4013: nanu sādhyadharmaś cāsau sāmānyaṃ ceti karmadhārayagarbhaḥ karmadhāraya ity ābhipretaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4014: viśeṣaś ca sādhyata iti kathaṃ sāmānyaśabdena sādhyadharmaśabdasya samāsa ity āśaṅkyāha -- na cetyādi |
GSP28durdhpru:4018: yata evam ato 'symād dhetor hi sapakṣalakṣaṇakāle |
GSP28durdhpru:4019: sāmānyasya sādhyatām uktvā sādhyadharmaśabedena saha sāmānyaśabdasya vigrahaṃ darśayati -- sādhyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4021: samāna evety avadhāraṇiyam na tu sāmānyenaiveti,
GSP28durdhpru:4022: anyenāpi vastutvādinā sādṛśyāt dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇaḥ sapakṣatvābhāvaprasaṅgād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4023: yadi sapakṣād anyo 'sapakṣo evānyadharmayogād anya iti tatrāsapakṣe varttamāno hetuḥ sarva evānaikāntikatvād ahetuḥ prasajyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:4024: atha viruddhe naño vidhānāt sapakṣaviruddho 'sapakṣaḥ sahānavasthānalakṣaṇena virodhena viruddhas tadā 'gnilakṣaṇo hetur auṣṇyaṃ na gamayet |
GSP28durdhpru:4026: tadā 'bhāve kasyacit sattvāsambhavāt sādhāraṇānaikāntiko na kaścit syād iti manasi niveśya pṛcchati -- ko 'sapakṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4029: sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti sādhyadharmavān yo na bhavatīty arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4031: yady evam, samāsaḥ kathaṃ iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:4033: apunarjñeyāni sāmāni, alavaṇabhojī, asūryampaśāni mukhāni “suḍnapuṃsakasya” [pāṇnini 1.1.43] iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4034_0: prayogasaṃkhyāniyamas tu bhāṣyakārīyo yathā 'nupapannas tathā cācāryeṇaiva viniścaye
GSP28durdhpru:4034_1: “duḥkhaṃ batāyaṃ tapasvī” ityādy upahāsapūrvakaṃ -- “yathā niketena pratipatteḥ”
GSP28durdhpru:4036: tato 'nyas tadviruddhas tadabhāvaś ca iti II-9
GSP28durdhpru:4039: tasya ca sapaksaya abhāvaḥ. sapakṣād anyatvaṃ tadviruddhatvaṃ ca na tāvat pratyetuṃ śakyam,
GSP28durdhpru:4040: yāvat sapakṣasvabhāvābhāvo na vijñātaḥ. tasmād anyatvaviruddhatvapratītisāmarthyāt[45] sapakṣābhāvarūpau pratītāv anyaviruddhau.
GSP28durdhpru:4044: evaṃ saty anyaviruddhayor asapakṣatvaṃ na syād ity asapakṣaśabdena tadabhāvatadanyatadviruddhanāṃ trayāṇām api saṅgrahaṃ darśayituṃ kaś cetyādinā praśnapūrvam upakra[ma]te |
GSP28durdhpru:4046: anya iti vivakṣitadharmānādhāraḥ, anyaviṣaye 'pi nañi vibhāgena niyogavṛtteḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4047: na hi sa eva brāhmaṇas tajjātiyogād, abrāhmaṇaś ca dharmāntarasamāveśāl loke pratīyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4055: kin tarhi? sarvaḥ pratiyogī niṣedhaḥ paryudataś ca, atattvalakṣaṇatvād asapakṣasya |
GSP28durdhpru:4056: tad vivakṣite pratiyogini tulyaṃ, vyatirekagateḥ sarvatra tulyatvāt, sākṣād arthāpattyā veti |
GSP28durdhpru:4060: anyaviruddhayoś ca svarūpakathanena tadasapakṣatvapakṣokto doṣo nirasta iti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28durdhpru:4061: nanu ca sapakṣo yo na bhavatīti vacanena yasya sapakṣābhāvasvabhāvatvaṃ tasyaivāsapakṣatvaṃ [41b] pratipādyate |
