GSP28durdhpru:10578: yataḥ prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryabhāvapratipattyarthaṃ darśanīyo vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntas tata eva tasmād eva kāraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10581: yadi hi kasyacid vidhinā kasyacid vidhir darśayitavyaḥ syāt, tadā gama(gaganā)
GSP28durdhpru:10582: dir asan kathaṃ kasyacid ādhāraḥ syād iti, na sidhyate tadupadarśanam |
GSP28durdhpru:10583: yadā tv ekasya vyāpyasyābhāve aparasya vyāpakasyābhāvo darśayitavyas tadā vyāpakasyā 'bhāve 'vastuni suṣṭhu sambhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:10585: so 'pi neti cet, ayam evābhāva ity abhiprāyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10586: vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntagrahaṇaṃ caitad ekadharmābhāvenāparadharmābhāvopadarśanaviṣayopalakṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyan anyathā sādharmyadṛṣṭānte tv avaśyaṃ vastu sa āśraya iṣṭa iti syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10587: tathā ca sati bahvasamañjasaṃ syād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10588: yataḥ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāvo vastuny avastuni ca bhavati tataḥ kāraṇād vastu mahāhradādi |
GSP28durdhpru:10593: yady evaṃ sādhyasādhakavyāptiprasādhakapramāṇapradarśakatvāt sādharmyadṛṣṭānta evopādeyo na vaidharyadṛṣṭāta ity āha --- prasiddheti |
GSP28durdhpru:10594: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti yojayitvā kuta upādeya ity āśaṅkāyāṃ prasiddhetyādihetupadaṃ yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:10597: yad vā pradarśyate 'sminn iti pradarśayatīti vā pradarśano hetvabhāvasya pradarśana iti tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:10600: asmiṃś cārthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭāānto bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:10601_0: yo 'yam artho vyāptisādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ[814] kaścid upādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaś[815]
GSP28durdhpru:10601_1: ca --- ity asminn arthe [816]darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta [817]ity āha --- etāvanmātraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:10601_2: rūpaṃ yasya tasya bhāvas tattvam, tasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10605: [821]etac ca heturūpākhyānād evākhyātam iti kiṃ dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇena?
GSP28durdhpru:10616: etena eva dṛṣṭāntadoṣā api nirastā bhavanti III-123
GSP28durdhpru:10617: etena eva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā[822] kathitā [823]bhavanti |
GSP28durdhpru:10618: tathāhi --- pūrvoktasiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi[824] dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakāryaṃ sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmyarthyād uktaṃ[825] bhavati ||
GSP28durdhpru:10625: asmiṃś ce tyādi mūlam anūdya vyācaṣṭe yo 'yam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10627: prasiddhāyāṃ vyāptau sādhyābhāve [79a] hetor nivṛttipradarśaḥ ity artho draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10629: anyad apy asya rūpam astīty āha --- etāvad eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:10630: hir yasmād etat parimāṇam asyeti tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:10632: kiṃ tad rūpam ity āha --- yad uteti |
GSP28durdhpru:10633: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yad etad ity asyārthe ||
GSP28durdhpru:10635: raṇāsāmarthye doṣaḥ sambhavati te kutaścit sāmānyād dṛṣṭāntavadābhāsamānā dṛṣṭāntābhāsā bhavantīti arthaṃ nyāyam āśrityāha --- dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ kathitā bhavantīti |
GSP28durdhpru:10636: yasmāt te dṛṣṭāntābhāsatve[na] katitā bhavanty ata eva dṣṭāntatvena nirastā bhavatīty ata eva mūlam arthato vyākhyātam ity avagantavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:10638: kathanaṃ kṛṭaṃ bhavati tathā darśayituṃ tathā hītyādinopakramate |
GSP28durdhpru:10641: siddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyābhāve sādhananivṛttipradarśanalakṣaṇaṃ ca sādhayituṃ ya upādīyamāno 'pi na samarthaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:10650: yathā [826]nityaḥ śabdo iti [827]śabdasya nitytve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ|
GSP28durdhpru:10651: sādharmyeṇa karmavat paramāṇuvad ghaṭavad ity ete dṛṣṭātā upānyastāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10673: asarvajño ayaṃ rāgādimatvād rathyāpuruṣavad iti III-125
GSP28durdhpru:10674: tathā[832] sandigdhaḥ sādhyadharmo yasmin sa sandigdhasādhyadharmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10682: dṛṣāntābhāsān ityādi paramāṇūnām ity etad antaṃ sugamam |
GSP28durdhpru:10683: kathaṃ paramāṇavaḥ sādhanavikalā na sādhyavikalā ity āha --- asarveti |
GSP28durdhpru:10687: tatra yadi dravyaparimāṇaṃ mūrttir ity eva tāvad ucyate tadā ''kāśāder api dravyasya paramamahattvanām adheyaṃ parimāṇam astīti mūrttatvaṃ prasajyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:10689: tatra paramāṇoḥ paramāṇaṃ bhavaty asarvagatasya dravyasyeti darśayann āha --- asarvagatāś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:10690: samavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyaṃ guṇavad veti dravyalakṣṇayogād dravyarūpaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10692: tat punaḥ paramāṇoḥ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalasaṃjñakaṃ jñātavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:10694: sādhyāvaikalyaṃ darśayann āha --- nityās tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10698: atha [vā] ṣaṭpadārthīpratipādakatayā viśiṣyate tad anyasmāc chāstrād iti viśeṣaḥ kāṇādaṃ śāstraṃ vivakṣitam |
GSP28durdhpru:10699: [834]“tad vidanty adhīyate vā” iti vaiśeṣikās tair iṣyanta iti vacanavyaktyā ceṣṭimātram etan na punar atra pramāṇam astīti sūcayati |
GSP28durdhpru:10723: yathā yo uktā sa rāgādimān, iṣṭapuruṣavat |
GSP28durdhpru:10724: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavad iti III-126
GSP28durdhpru:10729: yasmin dṛṣṭānte dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayoḥ sambhavamātraṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10730: na tu sādhyena vyāpto hetuḥ, so 'nanvayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10731: apradarśitānvayaś ca --- yasmin dṛṣṭānte vidyamāno 'py anvayo na pradarśito vaktrā so 'pradarśitānvayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10733: yo ukteti vaktṛtvam anūdya sa rāgādimān iti rāgādimattvaṃ[837] vihitam |
GSP28durdhpru:10738: tena vaktṛtvarāgādimattvayoḥ sattvamātram iṣṭe puruṣe siddham |
GSP28durdhpru:10751: tata ityādi maraṇadharmatvam ity etad antaṃ sujñānam|
GSP28durdhpru:10752: nanu maraṇadharmatvam apy asya kathaṃ niściṃtaṃ yena hetur eva sandigdha ucyate iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:10757: yatra tu tan nāsti kevalaṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātraṃ dṛśyata ity abhiprāyaḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:10758: vaktṛtvasya heto rāgādimattve [79b] sādhye pratiniyamaḥ pratiniyatatvam uktam iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10759: tena sādhyaniyatatvena vyāptir anayor uktā pradarśitā |
GSP28durdhpru:10760: evaṃvidhānuvādavidhyupakarśane tathā pratīter āhatyodayād vyāptir uktety uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:10762: yato dvayor api vādiprativādinor dṛṣṭātatvena saṅgrahaḥ tena hetunā sattvamātraṃ sambhavamātraṃ sāhacaryamātram iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:10763: asti ceṣṭiḥ sahamātropakarśanam adoṣāvaham ity āha --- vyāptis tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10769: iha yady api kṛṭaktvena ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdas tathāpi nānityatvenāpi sadṛśaḥ pratyetuṃ śakyate[840] 'tiprasaṅgāt[841] |
GSP28durdhpru:10770: yadi tu kṛṭakatvam [842]anityasvabhāvaṃ [843]vijñātaṃ bhavaty [844]evaṃ kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10771: tasmād yat kṛtakaṃ tad anityam iti kṛtakatvam anityatve[845] niyatam abhidhāya niyamasādhanāyānvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo dṛṣṭānta upādeyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10773: anena tv anvayavākyam anuktvaiva dṛṣṭānta upāttaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10786: nanu ghaṭopadarśanena kṛtakatvena tād ghaṭasadṛśaḥ śabdo darśitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10787: tathā cānityatvenāpi sadṛśo darśitas tataś ca vyāptir darśitaivety āha --- iheti |
GSP28durdhpru:10789: kutas tathā pratyetum aśakya ity āha --- atiprasaṅgād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10794: na tarhi kṛtakatvād anityatvaṃ kadācid api pratyetavyam ity āha --- yadi tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10797: vidhānenārthāntaratve sati na nityatvasvabhāvaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ pratītaṃ bhavaty evaṃ tatsvābhāvyena pratipattau kṛtakatvād anityatvapratītiḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10798: yataḥ kṛtakatvasyānityatvasvabhāvāvagamāt tatas tatpratītir nānyathā tasmād hetoḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10801: anvayavākyārthapratipattiviṣayo 'pi dṛṣṭānto yady apradarśitānvayas tadā so 'pi nirupayogaḥ kim ity upādeya ity āha --- sa ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:10803: anena kathaṃ nāmāyam upātto yenaivam abhidhīyata ity āha --- aneneti |
GSP28durdhpru:10808: athaivam upātto 'pi yady upayujyate tadā kā kṣatir ity āha --- īdṛśaś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:10810: samānaḥ prakaraṇād ghaṭena sadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā |
GSP28durdhpru:10816: athaitat padadarśitāt sādharmyād api yadi sādhyam siddhyate tadā katham ayam anupayukta ity āha --- na ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:10818: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- anena khalu sādharmyaṃ pradarśanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:10819: kṛtakatvenaiva ca sādharmyaṃ pradarśyāyañ caritārtho bhaviṣyati |
GSP28durdhpru:10820: na ca kṛtakatvena ghaṭasādharmye śabdasyāvagate 'py anityatvenāpi tatsādharmyāvagamo 'vaśyambhāvīti śakyam abhidhātum |
GSP28durdhpru:10822: yataḥ sādharmyamātrān na sādhyasiddhir ataḥ kāraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10823: anvayo 'nvīyamānatvaṃ sādhanasya sādhyena so 'rthaḥ prayojanaṃ [80a] yasya sa tathā na sādharmyamātrapradarśanārtha ity arthāt |
GSP28durdhpru:10824: anenāpy anvayārtha evāyam upātta ity āha --- tadarthaś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:10827: kim arthas tarhy anenāyam upātta ity āha --- sādharmyeti | co yasmādarthe | co yasmādarthe |
GSP28durdhpru:10831: tato yadi nāma na duṣṭaṃ vastu tathāpi vaktrā duṣṭaṃ darśatam iti duṣtam eva ||
GSP28durdhpru:10832: tathā viparītānvayaḥ --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti III-127
GSP28durdhpru:10833: tathā viparītānvayo yasmin dṛṣṭāte sa tathoktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10834: tam evodārati --- yad anityaṃ tat kṛtakam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10837: atra tv anityatvaṃ kṛtakatve[847] niyataṃ darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:10839: [849] tato yādṛśam iha kṛtatvam aniyatam anityatve [850]darśitaṃ tādṛśān nāsty anityatvapratītiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10840: tathā hi --- yad anityam ity anityatvam anūdya tat kṛtakam iti kṛtakatvam vihitam |
GSP28durdhpru:10841: ato 'nityatvaṃ niyatam uktaṃ kṛtakatve, na tu kṛtakatvaṃ anityatve |
GSP28durdhpru:10842: tato yathā 'nityatvād aniyatāt prayatnānantarīyakatve na prayatnāntarīyakatvapratīti,
GSP28durdhpru:10849: [849] atra `tataḥ kṛtakatvam anityatve niyatam eva' ity adhikaḥ pāṭho 'sti |
GSP28durdhpru:10852: sādharmyārthaḥ sādharmyapratipādanaprayojana upāttas tasmān nirupayogaḥ sa |
GSP28durdhpru:10856: tat kathaṃ vidyamāne 'pi tasmin tathā 'pradarśanamātreṇāsau dṛṣṭānto duṣyatīty āha --- vaktṛdoṣād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10858: nanu vaktaivāsau tathā pradarśayann aparādhyatu, anyasya dṛṣṭāntatapasvinaḥ ko 'parādha iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:10860: tadakaraṇaṃ tasya svata eva (evā')sāmarthyād, anyenānyathā pradarśanād vā 'stu |
GSP28durdhpru:10861: kim etāvatā tad akaraṇaṃ tasya nāsty eveti sūktaṃ vaktṛdoṣād ayamṇ dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10862: viparīto 'nvaya iti vaiparītyena pradarśanād viparīta ukto na tu viparīto 'nvayo 'sty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:10863: kīdṛśo 'viparīto 'nvayo yasmād ayaṃ viparīta ity āha --- kṛtakatvam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10864: evaṃ pradarśane ko guṇa ity āha --- evam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10866: atra punaḥ kutra kiṃ niyatam ity āha --- atreti |
GSP28durdhpru:10868: anityatvānuvādena kṛtaktvasya vidhānād vidhīyamānasya vyāpakatayā niyamaviṣayatvād ity abhisandhiḥ kṛtakatvaṃ punaḥ kīdṛśaṃ darśitam ity āha ---[kṛtakatvam iti] |
GSP28durdhpru:10870: anityatve niyatād api kṛtaktavādi(-vāda)nityatvaṃ pratipaśyeta ity āha --- tata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10871: yata evam anuvādavidhikrame kṛtakatvam anityatvāniyataṃ darśataṃ bhavati, tatas tasmād iha prayoge |
GSP28durdhpru:10873: pūrvam evaṃ vādinā 'nityatvaṃ kṛtakatve niyataṃ darśitam,
GSP28durdhpru:10874: na kṛtakatvam nityatve ceti pratijñāmātreṇoktam adhunā tu yena prakāreṇa tasyaiva pradarśanam āyātaṃ tathā hītyādinā tad darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:10877: yady api ca kṛtakatvaṃ vastusthityā 'nityatve niyataṃ [851]tathāpy anityataṃ vaktrā [852]darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:10885: tasmād viparītānvayo 'pi vaktur aparādhāt, na vastuta (na) |
GSP28durdhpru:10886: parārthānumāne ca[855] vaktur api [856]doṣaś cintyata iti ||
GSP28durdhpru:10904: vaidharmyeṇa api --- paramāṇuvat karmavat ākāśavad iti sādhyādyavyatirekiṇaḥ III-129
GSP28durdhpru:10905: nityatve śabdasya sādhye hetāv amūttatve [861]paramāṇur vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyāvyatirekī |
GSP28durdhpru:10907: karma sādhanāvyatireki, amūrttatvāt karmaṇaḥ ākāśam ubhayāvyatireki, nityatvād amūrttatvāc ca |
GSP28durdhpru:10912: tatra yathā 'nityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītis tadvat kṛtakatvād apy anitya[tva]nityatvapratītir bhavitum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:10913: nanu bhavatu anityatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvāpratītir vastutas tasya tatrāniyatatvāt kṛtakatvaṃ tu paramārthato niyatam nityatve |
GSP28durdhpru:10914: tat kutas tasmāt tasyāpratītir ity āha --- yady apītyādi |
GSP28durdhpru:10915: evaṃ bruvato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ --- vastutaś chedanasvabhāvo 'pi paraśur yadācchedakena bhrāntyā 'nyathā vā udvarttya bāhum udyamya dvaidhībhāvārthaṃ dhavādau nipātyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10916: tadā tena svayam aduṣṭenāpi yathā chidā na sampādyate,
GSP28durdhpru:10919: yasmād evaṃ tasmād [80b] hetor vaktur anumāpayitur aparādhād doṣād viparītānvayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti doṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10920: na kevalam apradārśitānvaya ity āha --- parārtheti |
GSP28durdhpru:10921: na kevalaṃ sādhanasya doṣaś cintyata ity api śabdāt ||
GSP28durdhpru:10922: yato 'lpīyo nāsti sa paramāṇuḥ vaidharmyapratipāda [na] viṣayopāttatvān vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10925: sādhyam ādir yeṣām tāni sādhyādīni sādhyasādhanobhayāni |
GSP28durdhpru:10927: sa yeṣām asti te sādhyādyavyatirekiṇaḥ | te codāhṛtāḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:10933: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapilādayo anāptā vā avidyamānasarvajñatāptatāliṅgabhūtapramāṇātiśayaśāsanatvād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10934: atra[863]vaidharmyodāharaṇam --- yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikam upadiṣṭavān,
GSP28durdhpru:10952: sarmvajñātā ca āptatā ca tayor liṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśayo liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇaviśeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:10953: avidyamānaḥ sarvajñātāptatāliṅgabhūtaḥ pramāṇātiśo yasmin tat tathoktaṃ śāsanam |
GSP28durdhpru:10958: yadi hi kapilādayaḥ sarvajñā āpto vā syus tadā jyotirjñānādikam kamān nopadiṣṭavntaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:10965: yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotirjñānādikaṃ sarvajñatāptatā liṅgabhūtam uapadiṣṭavān |
GSP28durdhpru:10966: yathā ṛṣabho vardhamānaś ca tāv ādī yasya sa ṛṣabhavardhamānādir digambarāṇāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:10967: prakaraṇāt kṣīṇadoṣatvam āptatvakṣaṇamasya vivakṣitam iti tat vā anāptā akṣīṇadoṣā iti vyācaṣṭe |
GSP28durdhpru:10971: nanu teṣām api śāsane liṅgātmakaḥ pramāṇātiśayo 'neko 'sty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:10972: tat kathaṃ hetur ayam asiddho na bhavatīty āha --- pramāṇātiśaya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10975: tad ayaṃ samudāyārthaḥ --- yasmāt tair jyotirjñānam anyātīndriyajñānaṃ ca svaśāsane nopadiṣṭaṃ tasmāt te na tathārūpā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:10979: tad iha vaidharmyodāharaṇād ṛśabhāder asarvajñatvasyānāptatāyāś ca vyatireko vyāvṛttiḥ saṃdigdhā |
